summary.span: 提供对“消息队列”服务器上的队列的访问。

span.span: Provides access to a queue on a Message Queuing server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列技术允许在不同时间运行的应用程序在异类网络和可能暂时脱机的系统之间进行通信。The Message Queuing technology allows applications running at different times to communicate across heterogeneous networks and systems that might be temporarily offline. 应用程序从队列发送、接收或查看（不删除）消息。Applications send, receive, or peek (read without removing) messages from queues. 消息队列是 [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)] 和 Windows NT 的可选组件，并且必须单独安装。Message Queuing is an optional component of [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)] and Windows NT, and must be installed separately. 类是消息队列周围的包装器。The class is a wrapper around Message Queuing. 有多个版本的消息队列，使用 类可能会产生略微不同的行为，具体取决于所使用的操作系统。There are multiple versions of Message Queuing, and using the class can result in slightly different behavior, depending on the operating system you are using. 有关每个版本的消息队列的特定功能的信息，请参阅 MSDN 中的平台 SDK 中的 "消息队列新增功能" 主题。For information about specific features of each version of Message Queuing, see the topic "What's New in Message Queuing" in the Platform SDK in MSDN. 类提供对 "消息队列" 队列的引用。The class provides a reference to a Message Queuing queue. 您可以在 构造函数中指定一个路径以连接到现有资源，也可以在服务器上创建一个新队列。You can specify a path in the constructor to connect to an existing resource, or you can create a new queue on the server. 必须先将 类的新实例与现有队列相关联，然后才能调用 、或 。Before you can call , , or , you must associate the new instance of the class with an existing queue. 此时，可以对队列属性进行操作，例如 和 。At that point, you can manipulate the queue properties such as and . 支持两种类型的消息检索：同步和异步。 supports two types of message retrieval: synchronous and asynchronous. 同步方法 和 会导致进程线程等待指定的时间间隔，使新消息到达队列。The synchronous methods, and , cause the process thread to wait a specified time interval for a new message to arrive in the queue. 和 的异步方法允许主要的应用程序任务继续在单独的线程中，直到消息到达队列。The asynchronous methods, and , allow the main application tasks to continue in a separate thread until a message arrives in the queue. 这些方法的工作方式是使用回调对象和状态对象在线程之间传递信息。These methods work by using callback objects and state objects to communicate information between threads. 创建 类的新实例时，不会创建新的 "消息队列" 队列。When you create a new instance of the class, you are not creating a new Message Queuing queue. 相反，你可以使用 、和 方法来管理服务器上的队列。Instead, you can use the , , and methods to manage queues on the server. 与 不同， 和 是 `static` 成员，因此你可以在不创建 类的新实例的情况下调用它们。Unlike , and are `static` members, so you can call them without creating a new instance of the class. 可以将 对象的 属性设置为以下三个名称之一：友好名称、或 。You can set the object's property with one of three names: the friendly name, the , or the . 友好名称（由队列的 和 属性定义）是 \\ 用于公共队列），专用队列 \\`Private$`\\。The friendly name, which is defined by the queue's and properties, is \\ for a public queue, and \\`Private$`\\ for a private queue. 属性允许脱机访问消息队列。The property allows offline access to message queues. 最后，可以使用队列的 属性设置队列的 。Lastly, you can use the queue's property to set the queue's . 有关 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用各种路径名称语法类型创建新的 对象。The following code example creates new objects using various path name syntax types. 在每种情况下，它会将消息发送到其路径在构造函数中定义的队列。In each case, it sends a message to the queue whose path is defined in the constructor. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CPP/mqpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CS/mqpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/VB/mqpath.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用名为 `Order`的应用程序特定的类将消息发送到队列，并从队列接收消息。The following code example sends a message to a queue, and receives a message from a queue, using an application-specific class called `Order`. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/CPP/mqreceive_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/CS/mqreceive_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/VB/mqreceive_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载创建 类的新实例，该实例不会立即绑定到消息队列服务器上的队列。Use this overload to create a new instance of the class that is not immediately tied to a queue on the Message Queuing server. 使用此实例之前，必须通过设置 "" 属性将其连接到现有的 "消息队列" 队列。Before using this instance, you must connect it to an existing Message Queuing queue by setting the property. 或者，您可以将 引用设置为 方法的返回值，从而创建新的 "消息队列" 队列。Alternatively, you can set the reference to the method's return value, thereby creating a new Message Queuing queue. 构造函数实例化 类的新实例;它不会创建新的 "消息队列" 队列。The constructor instantiates a new instance of the class; it does not create a new Message Queuing queue. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||由 类的无参数构造函数设置的值。The values set by the parameterless constructor of the class.| ||| ||由 类的无参数构造函数设置的值。The values set by the parameterless constructor of the class. 所有筛选器值均设置为 `true`。All the filter values are set to `true`.| ||`false`| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新的 。The following code example creates a new . remarks.format:
## Remarks 若要将新的 实例绑定到特定的 "消息队列" 队列，请使用此重载，您知道其路径、格式名称或标签。Use this overload when you want to tie the new instance to a particular Message Queuing queue, for which you know the path, format name, or label. 如果要授予对引用队列的第一个应用程序的独占访问权限，则必须将 属性设置为 `true` 或使用传递读访问限制参数的构造函数。If you want to grant exclusive access to the first application that references the queue, you must set the property to `true` or use the constructor that passes a read-access restriction parameter. 构造函数实例化 类的新实例;它不会创建新的 "消息队列" 队列。The constructor instantiates a new instance of the class; it does not create a new Message Queuing queue. 若要在消息队列中创建新队列，请使用 。To create a new queue in Message Queuing, use . `path` 参数的语法取决于它所引用的队列的类型，如下表所示。The syntax of the `path` parameter depends on the type of queue it references, as shown in the following table. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日志队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日志队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 或者，您可以使用 或 来描述队列路径，如下表所示。Alternatively, you can use the or to describe the queue path, as shown in the following table. |参考Reference|语法Syntax|示例Example| |---------------|------------|-------------| |格式名称Format name|`FormatName:` [*格式名*]`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]|`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112

`FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |LabelLabel|`Label:` [ *label* ]`Label:` [ *label* ]|`Label:` TheLabel`Label:` TheLabel| 若要脱机工作，必须使用格式名语法，而不是构造函数的路径名称语法。To work offline, you must use the format name syntax, not the path name syntax for the constructor. 否则，会引发异常，因为主域控制器不可用于解析格式名称的路径。Otherwise, an exception is thrown because the primary domain controller is not available to resolve the path to the format name. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . 这些值基于其路径由 `path` 参数指定的 "消息队列" 队列的属性。These values are based on the properties of the Message Queuing queue with the path specified by the `path` parameter. |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||00| ||| ||由 类的无参数构造函数设置的值。The values set by the parameterless constructor of the class.| ||`true`，如果 "消息队列" 队列的隐私级别设置为 "正文"，则为;否则，`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing queue's privacy level setting is "Body"; otherwise, `false`.| ||| ||| ||"消息队列" 队列的 "计算机名" 属性的值。The value of the Message Queuing queue's computer name property.| ||| ||| ||由 类的无参数构造函数设置的值。The values set by the parameterless constructor of the class.| ||，如果不是由构造函数设置的。, if not set by the constructor.| ||，如果不是由构造函数设置的。, if not set by the constructor.| ||`false`| ||`true`，如果启用了消息队列对象的日志设置，则为;否则，`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing object's journal setting is enabled; otherwise, `false`.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用各种路径名称语法类型创建新的 对象。The following code example creates new objects using various path name syntax types. 在每种情况下，它会将消息发送到其路径在构造函数中定义的队列。In each case, it sends a message to the queue whose path is defined in the constructor. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CPP/mqpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CS/mqpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/VB/mqpath.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 若要将新的 绑定到特定的 "消息队列" 队列，请使用此重载。Use this overload when you want to tie the new to a particular Message Queuing queue, for which you know the path, format name, or label. 如果要授予对引用队列的第一个应用程序的独占访问权限，请将 `sharedModeDenyReceive` 参数设置为 `true`。If you want to grant exclusive access to the first application that references the queue, set the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter to `true`. 否则，将 `sharedModeDenyReceive` 设置为 `false` 或使用只有 `path` 参数的构造函数。Otherwise, set `sharedModeDenyReceive` to `false` or use the constructor that has only a `path` parameter. 将 `sharedModeDenyReceive` 设置为 `true` 会影响访问 "消息队列" 队列的所有对象，包括其他应用程序。Setting `sharedModeDenyReceive` to `true` affects all objects that access the Message Queuing queue, including other applications. 此参数的效果并不限于此应用程序。The effects of the parameter are not restricted to this application. 构造函数创建 类的新实例;它不会创建新的 "消息队列" 队列。The constructor creates a new instance of the class; it does not create a new Message Queuing queue. 若要在消息队列中创建新队列，请使用 。To create a new queue in Message Queuing, use . `path` 参数的语法取决于队列的类型。The syntax of the `path` parameter depends on the type of queue. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日志队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日志队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 或者，您可以使用 "消息队列" 队列的格式名称或标签来描述队列路径。Alternatively, you can use the format name or label of a Message Queuing queue to describe the queue path. |参考Reference|语法Syntax|示例Example| |---------------|------------|-------------| |格式名称Format name|`FormatName:` [*格式名*]`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]|`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112

`FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=SPX:` `NetworkNumber`; `HostNumber`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=TCP:` `IPAddress`\\`QueueName`

`FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName``FormatName:DIRECT=OS:` `MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |LabelLabel|`Label:` [ *label* ]`Label:` [ *label* ]|`Label:` TheLabel`Label:` TheLabel| 若要脱机工作，必须使用格式名语法，而不是友好名称语法。To work offline, you must use the format name syntax, rather than the friendly name syntax. 否则，会引发异常，因为主域控制器（在其上 Active Directory）无法解析到格式名称的路径。Otherwise, an exception is thrown because the primary domain controller (on which Active Directory resides) is not available to resolve the path to the format name. 如果 打开的队列的 `sharedModeDenyReceive` 参数设置为 `true`，则随后尝试从队列中读取的任何 都会生成一个 ，因为存在共享冲突。If a opens a queue with the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter set to `true`, any that subsequently tries to read from the queue generates a because of a sharing violation. 如果 尝试以独占模式访问队列，而另一个 已对队列进行非独占访问，则也会引发 。A is also thrown if a tries to access the queue in exclusive mode while another already has non-exclusive access to the queue. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . 这些值基于 "消息队列" 队列的属性，具有由 `path` 参数指定的路径。These values are based on the properties of the Message Queuing queue, with the path specified by the `path` parameter. |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`。`false`.| ||0.0.| ||。.| ||由 类的无参数构造函数设置的值。The values set by the parameterless constructor of the class.| ||`true`，如果 "消息队列" 队列的隐私级别设置为 "正文"，则为;否则，`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing queue's privacy level setting is "Body"; otherwise, `false`.| ||。.| ||。.| ||"消息队列" 队列的 "计算机名" 属性的值。The value of the Message Queuing queue's computer name property.| ||。.| ||。.| ||由 类的无参数构造函数设置的值。The values set by the parameterless constructor of the class.| ||，如果不是由构造函数设置的。, if not set by the constructor.| ||，如果不是由构造函数设置的。, if not set by the constructor.| ||`sharedModeDenyReceive` 参数的值。The value of the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter.| ||`true`，如果启用了消息队列对象的日志设置，则为;否则，`false`。`true`, if the Message Queuing object's journal setting is enabled; otherwise, `false`.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有独占访问权限的新 ，设置其路径，并将消息发送到该队列。The following code example creates a new with exclusive access, sets its path, and sends a message to the queue. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive/CPP/mqctor_denysharedreceive.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive/CS/mqctor_denysharedreceive.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ctor_PathSharedModeDenyReceive/VB/mqctor_denysharedreceive.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 队列的默认访问模式为 `QueueAccessMode.SendAndReceive`，除非在调用构造函数时另行指定。The default access mode for a queue is `QueueAccessMode.SendAndReceive`, unless you specify otherwise when calling the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Authenticate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Authenticate : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示队列是否仅接受经过身份验证的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue accepts only authenticated messages.

value.span: 如果队列仅接受已经过身份验证的消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the queue accepts only authenticated messages; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息身份验证提供了一种方法，可确保消息的完整性并验证发送消息的用户。Message authentication provides a way to ensure message integrity and to verify who sent the message. 为了请求身份验证，发送应用程序会设置消息的身份验证级别。To request authentication, the sending application sets the message's authentication level. 将 设置为 `true`时，将限制对服务器上的队列的访问，而不仅限于此 实例。When you set to `true`, you are restricting access to the queue on the server, not only to this instance. 针对同一个 "消息队列" 队列的所有客户端都将受到影响。All clients working against the same Message Queuing queue will be affected. 仅接受经过身份验证的消息的队列将拒绝未经过身份验证的消息。A queue that accepts only authenticated messages will reject a non-authenticated message. 若要请求拒绝消息，发送应用程序可以设置消息的 属性。To request notification of message rejection, a sending application can set the property of the message. 由于不存在消息拒绝的其他指示，因此发送应用程序可能会丢失消息，除非你请求将该消息发送到死信队列。Because no other indication of message rejection exists, the sending application can lose the message unless you request that it be sent to the dead-letter queue. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置基优先级，“消息队列”使用该基优先级在网络上传送公共队列的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the base priority Message Queuing uses to route a public queue's messages over the network.

value.span: 发送到（公共）队列的所有消息的单个基本优先级。

span.span: The single base priority for all messages sent to the (public) queue.

value.span: 默认值为零 (0)。

span.span: The default is zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列的基本优先级指定消息发送到该队列的消息在通过网络传输时的处理方式。A message queue's base priority specifies how a message en route to that queue is treated as it travels through the network. 可以设置 属性，以便向发送到指定队列的所有消息授予更高或更低的优先级，而不是发送到其他队列的消息。You can set the property to confer a higher or lower priority to all messages sent to the specified queue than those sent to other queues. 设置此属性将修改 "消息队列" 队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他 实例都受此更改的影响。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 消息队列的 与消息的 属性无关，后者指定传入消息在队列中的排列顺序。A message queue's is not related to the property of a message, which specifies the order in which an incoming message is placed in the queue. 仅适用于其路径是使用格式名称指定的公用队列。 applies only to public queues whose paths are specified using the format name. 专用队列的基本优先级始终为零（0）。The base priority of a private queue is always zero (0). 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#4)]

summary.span: 启动一个没有超时设定的异步查看操作。直到队列中出现消息时，才完成此操作。

span.span: Initiates an asynchronous peek operation that has no time-out. The operation is not complete until a message becomes available in the queue.

returns.span: 该 标识已发布的异步请求的。

span.span: The that identifies the posted asynchronous request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在异步处理过程中，当消息在队列中可用时，使用 引发 事件。In asynchronous processing, you use to raise the event when a message becomes available in the queue. 如果队列中已经存在消息，也会引发 。 is also raised if a message already exists in the queue. 若要使用 ，请创建一个事件处理程序，用于处理异步操作的结果，并将其与事件委托相关联。To use , create an event handler that processes the results of the asynchronous operation, and associate it with your event delegate. 启动异步查看操作;当消息到达队列时，会通过引发 事件来通知 。 initiates an asynchronous peek operation; the is notified, through the raising of the event, when a message arrives in the queue. 然后， 可以通过调用 或通过使用 检索结果来访问该消息。The can then access the message by calling or by retrieving the result using the . 方法立即返回，但在调用事件处理程序之前，不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 由于 是异步的，因此你可以调用它来查看队列，而不会阻止当前的执行线程。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to peek the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要同步查看队列，请使用 方法。To synchronously peek the queue, use the method. 异步操作完成后，可以在事件处理程序中调用 或再次 ，以继续接收通知。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. 返回的 标识方法启动的异步操作。The that returns identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 可以在操作的整个生存期内使用此 ，不过，在调用 之前，通常不使用此方法。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果您启动多个异步操作，则可以将其 值放在数组中，并指定是等待所有操作还是完成任何操作。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，可以使用 的 属性来标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 如果 `false`，则会引发完成事件，但在调用 时将引发异常。If is `false`, the completion event is raised, but an exception will be thrown when calling . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为 `MyPeekCompleted`的事件处理程序，并将其附加到 事件处理程序委托，并调用 对位于路径 ".\myQueue" 的队列启动异步查看操作。The following code example creates an event handler named `MyPeekCompleted`, attaches it to the event handler delegate, and calls to initiate an asynchronous peek operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue". 引发 事件时，该示例将扫视消息，并将其正文写入屏幕。When a event is raised, the example peeks the message and writes its body to the screen. 然后，该示例再次调用 ，以启动新的异步查看操作。The example then calls again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation. If the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter expires, this component raises the event. 由于不存在任何消息，因此对 的后续调用将引发异常。Because no message exists, a subsequent call to will throw an exception. 如果 `false`，则会引发完成事件，但在调用 时将引发异常。If is `false`, the completion event is raised, but an exception will be thrown when calling . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用队列路径 ".\myQueue" 创建异步查看操作。The following code example creates an asynchronous peek operation, using the queue path ".\myQueue". 它创建事件处理程序，`MyPeekCompleted`，并将其附加到 事件处理程序委托。It creates an event handler, `MyPeekCompleted`, and attaches it to the event handler delegate. 用一分钟的超时时间调用 ，以启动异步查看操作。 is called with a time-out of one minute, to initiate the asynchronous peek operation. 引发 事件或超时过期时，将检索消息（如果存在），并将其正文写入屏幕。When a event is raised or the time-out expires, the message is retrieved if one exists, and its body is written to the screen. 然后再次调用 ，以使用相同的超时启动新的异步查看操作。Then is called again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation with the same time-out. 。 is also raised if a message already exists in the queue. 方法立即返回，但在调用事件处理程序之前，不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 由于 是异步的，因此你可以调用它来查看队列，而不会阻止当前的执行线程。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to peek the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要同步查看队列，请使用 方法。To synchronously peek the queue, use the method. 异步操作完成后，可以在事件处理程序中调用 或再次 ，以继续接收通知。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. 返回一个 ，用于标识该方法启动的异步操作。 returns a that identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 可以在操作的整个生存期内使用此 ，不过，在调用 之前，通常不使用此方法。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果您启动多个异步操作，则可以将其 值放在数组中，并指定是等待所有操作还是完成任何操作。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，可以使用 的 属性来标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 状态对象将状态信息与操作相关联。The state object associates state information with the operation. 例如，如果多次调用 以启动多个操作，则可以通过定义的单独状态对象标识每个操作。For example, if you call multiple times to initiate multiple operations, you can identify each operation through a separate state object that you define. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个异步查看操作。The following code example creates an asynchronous peek operation. 此代码示例将消息发送到本地消息队列，然后调用 并传入：超时值为10秒;标识特定消息的唯一整数;用于标识事件处理程序的 的新实例，`MyPeekCompleted`。The code example sends a message to a local message queue, then calls , passing in: a time-out value of ten seconds; a unique integer that identifies that particular message; and a new instance of that remarks.format: ## Remarks 在异步处理过程中，如果已从队列中删除消息，则使用 引发 事件。In asynchronous processing, you use to raise the event when a message has been removed from the queue. 如果队列中已经存在消息，也会引发 。 is also raised if a message already exists in the queue. 若要使用 ，请创建一个事件处理程序，用于处理异步操作的结果并将其与事件委托相关联。To use , create an event handler that processes the results of the asynchronous operation and associate it with your event delegate. 启动异步接收操作;当消息到达队列时，会通过引发 事件来通知 。 initiates an asynchronous receive operation; the is notified, through the raising of the event, when a message arrives in the queue. 然后， 可以通过调用 来访问该消息。The can then access the message by calling . 方法立即返回，但在调用事件处理程序之前，不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 由于 是异步的，因此你可以调用它来接收队列中的消息，而不会阻止当前的执行线程。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to receive a message from the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要以同步方式接收消息，请使用 方法。To synchronously receive a message, use the method. 异步操作完成后，可以在事件处理程序中调用 或再次 ，以继续接收通知。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. 返回的 标识方法启动的异步操作。The that returns identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 可以在操作的整个生存期内使用此 ，不过，在调用 之前，通常不使用此方法。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果您启动多个异步操作，则可以将其 值放在数组中，并指定是等待所有操作还是完成任何操作。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，可以使用 的 属性来标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 如果 `false`，则会引发完成事件，但在调用 时将引发异常。If is `false`, the completion event is raised, but an exception will be thrown when calling . 不要将异步调用 与事务一起使用。Do not use the asynchronous call with transactions. 如果要执行事务异步操作，请调用 ，并将事务和（同步） 方法置于你为查看操作创建的事件处理程序中。If you want to perform a transactional asynchronous operation, call , and put the transaction and the (synchronous) method within the event handler you create for the peek operation. 你的事件处理程序可能包含以下C#代码中所示的功能。Your event handler might contain functionality as shown in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.BeginTransaction(); myMessageQueue.Receive(); myMessageQueue.CommitTransaction(); ``` 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将异步请求链接在一起。The following code example chains asynchronous requests. 它假设本地计算机上有一个名为 "myQueue" 的队列。It assumes there is a queue on the local computer called "myQueue". `Main` 函数开始 `MyReceiveCompleted` 例程处理的异步操作。The `Main` function begins the asynchronous operation that is handled by the `MyReceiveCompleted` routine. `MyReceiveCompleted` 处理当前消息并开始新的异步接收操作。`MyReceiveCompleted` processes the current message and begins a new asynchronous receive operation. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CPP/mqbeginreceive_noparms_mre.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CS/mqbeginreceive_noparms_mre.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/VB/mqbeginreceive_noparms_mre.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例将异步请求排队。The following code example queues asynchronous requests. 对 的调用在其返回值中使用 。The call to uses the in its return value. 在退出之前，`Main` 例程会等待所有异步操作完成。The `Main` routine waits for all asynchronous operations to be completed before exiting. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CPP/mqbeginreceive_noparms_wh.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/CS/mqbeginreceive_noparms_wh.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginReceive_noparms_combined/VB/mqbeginreceive_noparms_wh.vb#2)]

If the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter expires, this component raises the event. 由于不存在任何消息，因此对 的后续调用将引发异常。Because no message exists, a subsequent call to will throw an exception. 不要将异步调用 与事务一起使用。Do not use the asynchronous call with transactions. 如果要执行事务异步操作，请调用 ，并将事务和（同步） 方法置于你为查看操作创建的事件处理程序中。If you want to perform a transactional asynchronous operation, call , and put the transaction and the (synchronous) method within the event handler you create for the peek operation. 你的事件处理程序可能包含以下C#代码中所示的功能。Your event handler might contain functionality as shown in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.BeginTransaction(); myMessageQueue.Receive(); myMessageQueue.CommitTransaction(); ``` 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个异步接收操作。The following code example creates an asynchronous receive operation. 此代码示例创建一个事件处理程序，`MyReceiveCompleted`，并将其附加到 事件处理程序委托。The code example creates an event handler, `MyReceiveCompleted`, and attaches it to the event handler delegate. 此代码示例将消息发送到本地消息队列，然后调用 ，并传入10秒的超时值。The code example sends a message to a local message queue, then calls , passing in a time-out value of ten seconds. 引发 事件时，事件处理程序将接收消息，并将消息正文写入屏幕。When a event is raised, the event handler receives the message and writes the message body to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在异步处理过程中，当消息在队列中可用或指定的时间间隔到期时，可以使用 引发 事件。In asynchronous processing, you use to raise the event when a message becomes available in the queue or when the specified interval of time has expired. 如果队列中已经存在消息，也会引发 。 is also raised if a message already exists in the queue. 使用此重载将信息与将在操作的整个生存期内保留的操作相关联。Use this overload to associate information with the operation that will be preserved throughout the operation's lifetime. 事件处理程序可以通过查看与操作关联的 的 属性来检测此信息。The event handler can detect this information by looking at the property of the that is associated with the operation. 若要使用 ，请创建一个事件处理程序，用于处理异步操作的结果并将其与事件委托相关联。To use , create an event handler that processes the results of the asynchronous operation and associate it with your event delegate. 启动异步接收操作;当消息到达队列时，会通过引发 事件来通知 。 initiates an asynchronous receive operation; the is notified, through the raising of the event, when a message arrives in the queue. 然后， 可以通过调用 或使用 检索结果来访问该消息。The can then access the message by calling or retrieving the result using the . 方法立即返回，但在调用事件处理程序之前，不会完成异步操作。The method returns immediately, but the asynchronous operation is not completed until the event handler is called. 由于 是异步的，因此你可以调用它来接收队列中的消息，而不会阻止当前的执行线程。Because is asynchronous, you can call it to receive a message from the queue without blocking the current thread of execution. 若要以同步方式接收消息，请使用 方法。To synchronously receive a message, use the method. 异步操作完成后，可以在事件处理程序中调用 或再次 ，以继续接收通知。Once an asynchronous operation completes, you can call or again in the event handler to keep receiving notifications. 返回的 标识方法启动的异步操作。The that returns identifies the asynchronous operation that the method started. 可以在操作的整个生存期内使用此 ，不过，在调用 之前，通常不使用此方法。You can use this throughout the lifetime of the operation, although you generally do not use it until is called. 但是，如果您启动多个异步操作，则可以将其 值放在数组中，并指定是等待所有操作还是完成任何操作。However, if you start several asynchronous operations, you can place their values in an array and specify whether to wait for all operations or any operation to complete. 在这种情况下，可以使用 的 属性来标识已完成的操作。In this case, you use the property of the to identify the completed operation. 此重载指定超时和状态对象。This overload specifies a time-out and a state object. 如果 `timeout` 参数指定的间隔过期，此组件将引发 事件。If the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter expires, this component raises the event. 由于不存在任何消息，因此对 的后续调用将引发异常。Because no message exists, a subsequent call to will throw an exception. 状态对象将状态信息与操作相关联。The state object associates state information with the operation. 例如，如果多次调用 以启动多个操作，则可以通过定义的单独状态对象标识每个操作。For example, if you call multiple times to initiate multiple operations, you can identify each operation through a separate state object that you define. 你还可以使用状态对象跨进程线程传递信息。You can also use the state object to pass information across process threads. 如果线程已启动，但回调在异步方案中的其他线程上，则将对状态对象进行封送处理，并将其与事件中的信息一起传递回来。If a thread is started but the callback is on a different thread in an asynchronous scenario, the state object is marshaled and passed back along with information from the event. 不要将异步调用 与事务一起使用。Do not use the asynchronous call with transactions. 如果要执行事务异步操作，请调用 ，并将事务和（同步） 方法置于你为查看操作创建的事件处理程序中。If you want to perform a transactional asynchronous operation, call , and put the transaction and the (synchronous) method within the event handler you create for the peek operation. 你的事件处理程序可能包含以下C#代码中所示的功能。Your event handler might contain functionality as shown in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.BeginTransaction(); myMessageQueue.Receive(); myMessageQueue.CommitTransaction(); ``` 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个异步接收操作。The following code example creates an asynchronous receive operation. 此代码示例创建一个事件处理程序，`MyReceiveCompleted`，并将其附加到 事件处理程序委托。The code example creates an event handler, `MyReceiveCompleted`, and attaches it to the event handler delegate. 此代码示例将一条消息发送到本地消息队列，然后调用 ，并传入一个10秒的超时值和一个标识该特定消息的唯一整数。The code example sends a message to a local message queue, then calls , passing in a time-out value of ten seconds and a unique integer that identifies that particular message. 引发 事件时，事件处理程序将接收消息，并将消息正文和整数消息标识符写入屏幕。When a event is raised, the event handler receives the message and writes the message body and the integer message identifier to the screen. [!code-cpp[MessageQueueBeginReceive2#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueueBeginReceive2/cpp/class1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueueBeginReceive2#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueueBeginReceive2/CS/class1.cs#0)]

The method is not thread safe.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否可读。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the can be read.

value.span: 如果存在 而且应用程序可从其中读取，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exists and the application can read from it; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示应用程序是否能够查看或接收来自队列的消息。 indicates whether the application is able to peek or receive messages from the queue. 如果 `true`，则 可以接收或查看队列中的消息。If is `true`, the can receive or peek messages from the queue. 否则，不能。Otherwise, it cannot. 如果队列已使用独占读取访问权限打开（或者，如果它是使用非独占访问权限打开的，并且此 请求独占访问），或者如果应用程序没有足够的访问权限，则 `false`。 is `false` if a queue is already open with exclusive read access (or if it's open with non-exclusive access and this requests exclusive access), or if the application does not have sufficient rights to access it. 如果在 `false` 时，应用程序尝试从队列读取，则拒绝访问。If your application tries to read from a queue when is `false`, access is denied. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example displays the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#5)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否可写。

value.span: 如果存在 而且应用程序可向其中写入，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exists and the application can write to it; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示应用程序是否能够将消息发送到队列。 indicates whether the application is able to send messages to the queue. 如果 `true`，则 可以将消息发送到队列。If is `true`, the can send messages to the queue. 否则，不能。Otherwise, it cannot. 如果队列已使用独占写入访问权限打开（或者，如果它是使用非独占访问权限打开的，并且此 请求独占访问），或者如果应用程序没有足够的访问权限，则 `false`。 is `false` if a queue is already open with exclusive write access (or if it's open with non-exclusive access and this requests exclusive access), or if the application does not have sufficient rights to access it. 如果在 `false`，应用程序将尝试写入队列，拒绝访问。If your application tries to write to a queue when is `false`, access is denied. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example displays the value of a message queue's property. summary.span: 获取或设置队列类别。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue category.

value.span: ，表示队列类别（“消息队列”类型标识符），它允许应用程序将其队列分类。

span.span: A that represents the queue category (Message Queuing type identifier), which allows an application to categorize its queues.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 队列类别允许应用程序将其队列分类。The queue category allows an application to categorize its queues. 例如，您可以将所有计费队列放在一个类别中，将所有订单队列放在另一个类别中。For example, you can place all Billing queues in one category and all Order queues in another. 属性提供对 "消息队列类型 ID" 属性（可读/写）的访问权限，可通过 "计算机管理" 控制台中的 "**队列属性**" 对话框进行访问。The property provides access to the Message Queuing Type ID property (which is read/write), accessible through the **Queue Properties** dialog box in the Computer Management Console. 您可以定义一个新类别。You can define a new category. 尽管可以使用 来创建在所有 值中都是唯一的类别值，但不需要这样的操作。Although you can use to create a category value that is unique across all values, such an action is unnecessary. 类别值仅需与其他类别不同，而不是来自所有其他 值。The category value needs to be distinct only from other categories, not from all other values. 例如，您可以将 {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001} 指定为一组队列的 ，并 {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002} 作为另一个集的 。For example, you can assign {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001} as the for one set of queues and {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002} as the for another set. 不需要设置 。It is not necessary to set the . 该值可以为 `null`。The value can be `null`. 设置此属性将修改 "消息队列" 队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他 实例都受此更改的影响。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 释放 分配的所有资源。

span.span: Frees all resources allocated by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 释放与 关联的所有资源，包括共享资源（如果适用）。 frees all resources associated with a , including shared resources if appropriate. 如果这些资源仍可用，例如在调用 方法时，系统会自动重新获取这些资源，如以下C#代码所示。The system re-acquires these resources automatically if they are still available, for example when you call the method, as in the following C# code. ```csharp myMessageQueue.Send("Text 1."); myMessageQueue.Close(); myMessageQueue.Send("Text 2."); //Resources are re-acquired. ``` 调用 时，直接访问 "消息队列" 队列的所有 属性都将被清除。、、和 都保留原样。When you call , all properties that directly access the Message Queuing queue are cleared out. The , , , and all remain as they were. 不会始终释放队列的读取和写入句柄，因为它们可能是共享的。 does not always free the read and write handles to a queue, because they might be shared. 可以执行以下任何步骤，以确保 释放队列的读取和写入句柄：You can take any of the following steps to ensure that frees the read and write handles to a queue: - 创建具有独占访问权限的 。Create the with exclusive access. 为此，请调用 或 构造函数，并将 `sharedModeDenyReceive` 参数设置为 `true`。To do so, call the or constructor, and set the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter to `true`. - 在禁用连接缓存的情况创建 。Create the with connection caching disabled. 为此，请调用 构造函数并将 `enableConnectionCache` 参数设置为 `false`。To do so, call the constructor and set the `enableConnectionCache` parameter to `false`. - 禁用连接缓存。Disable connection caching. 为此，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To do so, set the property to `false`. 在删除消息队列服务器上的队列之前，应为队列调用 。You should call for a queue before you delete the queue on the Message Queuing server. 否则，发送到队列的消息可能会引发异常或出现在死信队列中。Otherwise, messages sent to the queue could throw exceptions or appear in the dead-letter queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例关闭 "消息队列" 队列。The following code example closes a Message Queuing queue. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将不属于 类型的任何对象发送到队列时， 会将该对象插入消息队列消息。When you send any object that is not of type to the queue, the inserts the object into a Message Queuing message. 此时， 适用于在 属性中指定的属性值的消息。At that time, the applies to the message the property values you specify in the property. 相反，如果将 发送到队列，则已为实例本身指定了这些属性，因此 对于 会被忽略。Conversely, if you send a to the queue, these properties are already specified for the instance itself, so is ignored for the . 尽管通过 对象设置属性，但 是指发送到队列的消息的属性，而不是队列本身。Although you set the properties through the object, the refers to the properties of the messages that are sent to the queue, not the queue itself. 下表显示了这些属性的默认值。The default values for the properties are shown in the following table. |属性Property|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`AcknowledgeType.None`| ||`null`| ||零Zero (0)| ||`true`| ||`EncryptionAlgorithm.RC2`| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`HashAlgorithm.MD5`| ||空字符串（""）Empty string ("")| ||`MessagePriority.Normal`| ||`false`| ||`null`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用消息的优先级来确定要为消息发送的默认属性。The following code example uses the priority of a message to determine default properties to send for the message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定此 引用的队列的共享模式。 specifies the shared mode of the queue referenced by this . 将 设置为 `true`，以指示只有此 才有权使用指定的 扫视或接收来自队列的消息。Set to `true` to indicate that only this should have access to peek or receive messages from the queue with the specified . 如果另一个 或另一个应用程序与同一队列资源关联，则该实例或应用程序将无法查看或接收消息，但仍可发送消息。If another or another application is associated with the same queue resource, that instance or application will not be able to peek or receive messages, but it can still send them. 如果 `false`，则队列可用于多个应用程序，用于发送、查看或接收消息。If is `false`, the queue is available to multiple applications for sending, peeking, or receiving messages. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收将其占用的内存回收。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. 在发布对 的最后一个引用之前，应调用 。You should call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收调用 对象的析构函数之前，将不会释放 正在使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接缓存是对包含队列读取或写入句柄的结构的引用的列表。A connection cache is a list of references to structures that contain read or write handles to queues. 如果 `true`，则每次调用 、或 时， 会借用缓存中的句柄，而不是打开新句柄。When is `true`, the borrows handles from the cache each time you call , , or , rather than open new handles. 这可以提高性能。This can improve performance. 使用连接缓存还可以将 与网络拓扑中的更改隔离开来。Using a connection cache also insulates the from changes in the network topology. 如果在连接缓存已满时创建与队列的新连接，则 使用新连接覆盖最近访问过的结构。If you create a new connection to a queue when the connection cache is full, the overwrites the least recently accessed structure with the new connection. 您可以通过调用 完全清除缓存，例如，如果您使用的队列的格式名称已更改，使前面的读取和写入句柄不再有效。You can clear the cache entirely by calling , for example, if the format names of the queues you are working with have changed so that the previous read and write handles are no longer valid. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你指定发送到队列的消息需要加密时，只会加密消息正文。When you specify that encryption is required for the messages sent to a queue, only the message bodies are encrypted. 不能对其他成员（例如 和 属性）进行加密。The other members (for example, the and properties) cannot be encrypted. 设置此属性将修改 "消息队列" 队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他 实例都受此更改的影响。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 加密消息会使消息成为私有消息。Encrypting a message makes the message private. 您可以通过适当地设置 属性来指定要 `None`、`Body`或 `Optional` 的队列的加密要求。You can specify the queue's encryption requirement to be `None`, `Body`, or `Optional` by setting the property appropriately. 消息的 设置必须与队列的加密要求相对应。The setting of the message must correspond to the encryption requirement of the queue. 如果未对消息进行加密，但队列指定了 `Body`，或者如果消息已加密但队列指定 `None`，则队列将拒绝该消息。If the message is not encrypted but the queue specifies `Body`, or if the message is encrypted but the queue specifies `None`, the message is rejected by the queue. 如果发送应用程序在此事件中请求否定确认消息，则消息队列将指示消息对发送应用程序的拒绝。If the sending application requests a negative acknowledgment message in this event, Message Queuing indicates the message's rejection to the sending application. 如果 `true` 属性，则会将加密失败的消息发送到死信队列。If the property is `true`, a message that fails encryption is sent to the dead-letter queue. 否则，消息将丢失。Otherwise, the message is lost. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发 事件时， 完成 调用启动的操作。When the event is raised, completes the operation that was initiated by the call. 为此， 查看消息。To do so, peeks the message. 可以指定超时，这会导致在消息在队列中出现之前发生超时的情况下引发 事件。 can specify a time-out, which causes the event to be raised if the time-out occurs before a message appears in the queue. 如果在没有消息到达队列的情况下出现超时，则对 的后续调用将引发异常。When a time-out occurs without a message arriving in the queue, a subsequent call to throws an exception. 用于读取导致引发 事件的消息。 is used to read the message that caused the event to be raised. 如果要继续异步查看消息，则可以在调用 之后再次调用 。If you want to continue to asynchronously peek messages, you can again call after calling . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为 `MyPeekCompleted`的事件处理程序，并将其附加到 事件处理程序委托，并调用 对位于路径 ".\myQueue" 的队列启动异步查看操作。The following code example creates an event handler named `MyPeekCompleted`, attaches it to the event handler delegate, and calls to initiate an asynchronous peek operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue". 引发 事件时，该示例将扫视消息，并将其正文写入屏幕。When a event is raised, the example peeks the message and writes its body to the screen. 然后，该示例再次调用 ，以启动新的异步查看操作。The example then calls again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/CPP/mqbeginpeek_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/CS/mqbeginpeek_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/VB/mqbeginpeek_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发 事件时， 完成 调用启动的操作。When the event is raised, completes the operation that was initiated by the call. 为此， 会收到消息。To do so, receives the message. 可以指定超时，这会导致在消息在队列中出现之前发生超时的情况下引发 事件。 can specify a time-out, which causes the event to be raised if the time-out occurs before a message appears in the queue. 如果在没有消息到达队列的情况下出现超时，则对 的后续调用将引发异常。When a time-out occurs without a message arriving in the queue, a subsequent call to throws an exception. 用于读取（从队列中删除）导致引发 事件的消息。 is used to read (removing from the queue) the message that caused the event to be raised. 如果要继续异步接收消息，可以在调用 之后再次调用 。If you want to continue to asynchronously receive messages, you can again call after calling . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将异步请求链接在一起。The following code example chains asynchronous requests. 它假设本地计算机上有一个名为 "myQueue" 的队列。It assumes there is a queue on the local computer called "myQueue". `Main` 函数开始 `MyReceiveCompleted` 例程处理的异步操作。The `Main` function begins the asynchronous operation that is handled by the `MyReceiveCompleted` routine. `MyReceiveCompleted` 处理当前消息并开始新的异步接收操作。`MyReceiveCompleted` processes the current message and begins a new asynchronous receive operation. summary.span: 获取“消息队列”在创建队列时生成的唯一队列名。

span.span: Gets the unique queue name that Message Queuing generated at the time of the queue's creation.

value.span: 队列的名称，该名称在网络上是唯一的。

span.span: The name for the queue, which is unique on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含队列的格式名。The property contains the format name of the queue. 消息队列使用格式名来标识要打开的队列以及如何访问它。Message Queuing uses the format name to identify which queue to open and how to access it. 与队列的大多数特征不同，格式名不是 "消息队列应用程序队列" 属性，因此无法通过 "消息队列" 管理工具进行访问。Unlike most of a queue's characteristics, the format name is not a Message Queuing application queue property, so you cannot access it through the Message Queuing management tool. 格式名称只是队列的唯一名称，消息队列在创建队列时生成，或者应用程序稍后生成。The format name is simply a unique name for the queue, which Message Queuing generates when it creates the queue or which the application generates later. 如果你使用路径名语法（如 `myComputer\myQueue`）来指定路径，而不是在读取或写入队列时使用格式名语法，则主域控制器（使用 Active Directory）将 转换为关联的 ，然后再访问该队列。If you specify a path using the path name syntax (such as `myComputer\myQueue`) rather than using the format name syntax when you read or write to the queue, the primary domain controller (which uses Active Directory) translates the into the associated before accessing the queue. 如果你的应用程序脱机工作，则必须使用 format name 语法;否则，主域控制器将不可用于执行路径转换。If your application is working offline, you must use the format name syntax; otherwise, the primary domain controller will not be available to perform the path translation. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example displays the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含格式化程序对象的实例，该实例在应用程序读取或写入队列时转换消息。The property contains an instance of a formatter object, which transforms messages when your application reads or writes to the queue. 当应用程序将消息发送到队列时，格式化程序将对象序列化为流，并将其插入消息正文。When the application sends message to the queue, the formatter serializes the object into a stream and inserts it into the message body. 从队列中进行读取时，格式化程序将消息数据反序列化为 的 属性。When reading from a queue, the formatter deserializes the message data into the property of a . 松耦合，因此使用此格式时，不需要在发送方和接收方上具有相同的对象类型。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 和 将数据序列化为二进制表示形式。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 发送或接收 COM 组件时，将使用 。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. 和 提供比 更快的吞吐量。 and provide faster throughput than the . 允许与 Visual Basic 6.0 消息队列应用程序的互操作性。The allows interoperability with Visual Basic 6.0 Message Queuing applications. 当应用程序将消息发送到队列时， 仅适用于那些使用默认消息属性的消息，。When your application sends messages to the queue, the applies only to those messages that use the default message properties, . 如果将 发送到队列，则消息队列将使用 属性中定义的格式化程序来改为序列化正文。If you send a to the queue, Message Queuing uses the formatter defined in the property to serialize the body instead. 类将始终使用 来接收或查看队列中的消息。The class will always use a to receive or peek a message from the queue. 使用 属性对消息进行反序列化。The message is deserialized using the property. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 设置消息正文的格式。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . [!code-cpp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CPP/message_binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CS/message_binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/VB/message_binaryformatter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 设置消息正文的格式。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回队列中消息的静态快照，而不是指向这些消息的动态链接。 returns a static snapshot of the messages in the queue, not dynamic links to those messages. 因此，不能使用数组来修改队列中的消息。Therefore, you cannot use the array to modify the messages in the queue. 如果要与队列进行实时、动态的交互（如删除消息的能力），请调用 方法，该方法将返回队列中的消息的动态列表。If you want real-time, dynamic interaction with the queue (such as the ability to delete messages), call the method, which returns a dynamic list of the messages in the queue. 由于 在调用方法时返回队列中的消息的副本，因此数组不反映到达队列中的新消息或从队列中删除的消息。Because returns a copy of the messages in the queue at the time the method was called, the array does not reflect new messages that arrive in the queue or messages that are removed from the queue. 仅检索未被 属性筛选掉的属性。 retrieves only those properties not filtered out by the property. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用计算机的标识符来实现两个目的：读取计算机日志并设置安全证书。You can use a computer's identifier for two purposes, among others: to read the computer journal and to set security certificates. 但是，当脱机工作时，无法为远程计算机调用 ，因为该应用程序必须有权访问域控制器上的目录服务。However, you cannot call for a remote computer when you are working offline because the application must have access to the directory service on the domain controller. 计算机标识符（或计算机标识符）是在将计算机添加到企业时消息队列创建的 。The computer identifier (or machine identifier) is a that Message Queuing creates when a computer is added to the enterprise. 消息队列将计算机标识符与 `Machine` 和 `Journal` 关键字结合起来，以创建具有 `Machine=;Journal`语法的计算机日志格式名称。Message Queuing combines the computer identifier with the `Machine` and `Journal` keywords to create the machine journal's format name, which has the syntax `Machine=;Journal`. 计算机日志（也称为日志队列）是在 `true` 属性时存储应用程序生成的消息的副本的系统队列。The machine journal, which is also known as the journal queue, is a system queue that stores copies of application-generated messages when the property is `true`. 此日志语法仅在构造队列的格式名时有效。This syntax for the journal is only valid when constructing the format name for the queue. 路径名称语法是 `MachineName`\\`Journal$`。The path name syntax is `MachineName`\\`Journal$`. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|NoNo| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|NoNo| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用 。The following code example calls . remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建队列中所有消息的动态列表。 creates a dynamic list of all the messages in a queue. 可以通过调用 返回的 的 ，从队列中删除枚举器当前位置的消息。You can remove from the queue the message at the enumerator's current position by calling for the that returns. 由于游标与队列中的消息动态列表相关联，因此，如果消息在当前游标位置之外，则枚举将反映对队列中的消息所做的任何修改。Because the cursor is associated with the dynamic list of messages in the queue, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to the messages in the queue, if the message is beyond the current cursor position. 例如，枚举器可以自动访问放置在游标当前位置之外的低优先级的消息，但不能访问在该位置之前插入的优先级较高的消息。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a lower-priority message placed beyond the cursor's current position, but not a higher-priority message inserted before that position. 但是，您可以通过调用 的 来重置枚举，从而将光标移回列表的开头。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 枚举中的消息顺序反映了它们在队列中的顺序，因此优先级较高的消息会出现在优先级较低的消息之前。The order of the messages in the enumeration reflects their order in the queue, so higher-priority messages will appear before lower-priority ones. 如果希望队列中消息的静态快照而不是动态连接到它们，请调用 。If you want a static snapshot of the messages in the queue rather than a dynamic connection to them, call . 此方法返回 对象的数组，这些对象表示调用方法时的消息。This method returns an array of objects, which represent the messages at the time the method was called. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取队列中消息的动态列表，并对 属性设置为 的所有消息进行计数。The following code example gets a dynamic list of messages in a queue and counts all messages with the property set to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建队列中所有消息的动态列表。 creates a dynamic list of all the messages in a queue. 可以通过调用 返回的 的 ，从队列中删除枚举器当前位置的消息。You can remove from the queue the message at the enumerator's current position by calling for the that returns. 由于游标与队列中的消息动态列表相关联，因此，如果消息在当前游标位置之外，则枚举将反映对队列中的消息所做的任何修改。Because the cursor is associated with the dynamic list of messages in the queue, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to the messages in the queue, if the message is beyond the current cursor position. 例如，枚举器可以自动访问放置在游标当前位置之外的低优先级的消息，但不能访问在该位置之前插入的优先级较高的消息。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a lower-priority message placed beyond the cursor's current position, but not a higher-priority message inserted before that position. 但是，您可以通过调用 的 来重置枚举，从而将光标移回列表的开头。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 枚举中的消息顺序反映了它们在队列中的顺序，因此优先级较高的消息会出现在优先级较低的消息之前。The order of the messages in the enumeration reflects their order in the queue, so higher-priority messages will appear before lower-priority ones. 如果希望队列中消息的静态快照而不是动态连接到它们，请调用 。If you want a static snapshot of the messages in the queue rather than a dynamic connection to them, call . 此方法返回 对象的数组，这些对象表示调用方法时的消息。This method returns an array of objects, which represent the messages at the time the method was called. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

Public Shared Function GetMessageQueueEnumerator () As MessageQueueEnumerator

summary.span: 提供只进游标语义，以枚举网络上的所有公共队列。

span.span: Provides forward-only cursor semantics to enumerate through all public queues on the network.

returns.span: ，提供网络上所有公共消息队列的动态列表。

span.span: A that provides a dynamic listing of all the public message queues on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的此重载返回网络上所有公共队列的枚举。This overload of returns an enumeration of all the public queues that are on the network. 由于游标与动态列表相关联，因此，枚举反映对删除或添加到游标当前位置之外的队列所做的任何修改。Because the cursor is associated with a dynamic listing, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to a queue list for queues deleted or added beyond the cursor's current position. 不会反映在游标当前位置之前添加或删除队列的操作。Additions or deletion of queues located before the cursor's current position are not reflected. 例如，枚举器可以自动访问追加到光标位置之外的队列，而不是在该位置之前插入的队列。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a queue appended beyond the cursor position but not one inserted before that position. 但是，您可以通过调用 的 来重置枚举，从而将光标移回列表的开头。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 网络中未定义队列的顺序。There is no defined ordering of queues in a network. 枚举器不按计算机、标签、公共或私有状态或任何其他可访问的条件对它们进行排序。An enumerator does not order them, for example, by computer, label, public or private status, or any other accessible criteria. 如果希望网络上的队列（而不是动态连接）的静态快照，请调用 或 。If you want a static snapshot of the queues on the network rather than a dynamic connection to them, call or . 这两个方法都返回 对象的数组，这些对象表示调用方法时的队列。Each of these two methods returns an array of objects, which represent the queues at the time the method was called. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|NoNo| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|NoNo| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将循环访问网络中的所有消息队列，并检查每个队列的路径。The following code example iterates through all the message queues in the network, and examines the path for each queue. 最后，它显示网络上公用队列的数量。Finally, it displays the number of public queues on the network. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/CPP/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/CS/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/VB/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的此重载返回网络上的所有公共队列的列表，这些队列满足应用程序条件中定义的条件。This overload of returns a listing of all the public queues on the network that satisfy criteria defined in the application criteria. 可以指定要包括的条件，例如，队列创建或修改时间、计算机名称、标签、类别或这些条件的任意组合。You can specify the criteria to include, for example, queue creation or modification time, computer name, label, category, or any combination of these. 由于游标与动态列表相关联，因此，枚举反映了对出现在游标当前位置之外的队列所做的任何修改。Because the cursor is associated with a dynamic listing, the enumeration reflects any modification you make to a queue that occurs beyond the cursor's current position. 不会反映对光标当前位置之前的队列所做的更改。Changes to queues located before the cursor's current position are not reflected. 例如，枚举器可以自动访问追加到光标位置之外的队列，而不是在该位置之前插入的队列。For example, the enumerator can automatically access a queue appended beyond the cursor position but not one inserted before that position. 但是，您可以通过调用 的 来重置枚举，从而将光标移回列表的开头。However, you can reset the enumeration, thereby moving the cursor back to the beginning of the list, by calling for the . 网络中未定义队列的顺序。There is no defined ordering of queues in a network. 枚举器不按计算机、标签、公共或私有状态或任何其他可访问的条件对它们进行排序。An enumerator does not order them, for example, by computer, label, public or private status, or any other accessible criteria. 如果希望网络上的队列（而不是动态连接到它们）的静态快照，则指定 或调用 的条件。If you want a static snapshot of the queues on the network rather than a dynamic connection to them, specify criteria for or call . 这两个方法都返回 对象的数组，这些对象表示调用方法时的队列。Each of these two methods returns an array of objects, which represent the queues at the time the method was called. 调用 、或 提供的结果与通过 、和 的筛选条件调用 的结果相同。Calling , , or provides the same results as calling with the filtering criteria of , , and , respectively. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|NoNo| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|NoNo| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将循环访问消息队列，并显示在最后一天中创建并且存在于计算机 "MyComputer" 上的每个队列的路径。The following code example iterates through message queues and displays the path of each queue that was created in the last day and that exists on the computer "MyComputer". remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持两种类型的消息检索：同步和异步。 supports two types of message retrieval: synchronous and asynchronous. 同步方法 和 会导致进程线程等待指定的时间间隔，使新消息到达队列。The synchronous methods, and , cause the process thread to wait a specified time interval for a new message to arrive in the queue. 如果 指定的时间间隔，则进程线程将保持阻止状态，直到新消息可用。If the specified time interval is , the process thread remains blocked until a new message is available. 另一方面， 和 （异步方法），则允许主应用程序任务继续在单独的线程中，直到消息到达队列。On the other hand, and (the asynchronous methods), allow the main application tasks to continue in a separate thread until a message arrives in the queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of the member. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是队列 的友好名称语法的有机组成部分。The is an integral component of the friendly name syntax of the queue . 下表显示了在要使用其友好名称标识队列路径时，应用于指定类型的队列的语法。The following table shows the syntax you should use for a queue of a specified type when you want to identify the queue path using its friendly name. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日志队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日志队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 指定 时，请使用本地计算机的 "."。Use "." for the local computer when specifying the . 此属性仅识别计算机名称，例如 `Server0`。Only the computer name is recognized for this property, for example, `Server0`. 属性不支持 IP 地址格式。The property does not support the IP address format. 如果你按 定义 ，则在脱机工作时应用程序将引发异常，因为路径转换需要域控制器。If you define the in terms of the , the application throws an exception when working offline because the domain controller is required for path translation. 因此，当脱机工作时，必须使用 语法的 。Therefore, you must use the for the syntax when working offline. 、和 属性是相关的。The , , and properties are related. 更改 属性会导致 属性发生更改。Changing the property causes the property to change. 它是从新的 和 生成的。It is built from the new and the . 更改 （例如，使用格式名语法）将重置 并 属性以引用新队列。Changing the (for example, to use the format name syntax) resets the and properties to refer to the new queue. 如果 属性为空，则 设置为指定计算机的日记队列。If the property is empty, the is set to the Journal queue of the computer you specify. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供对消息队列日志存储限制的访问。 provides access to the Message Queuing journal storage limit. 仅当 `true` 时，此方法才适用。It is relevant only when is `true`. 设置此属性将修改 "消息队列" 队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，此更改会影响任何其他 实例Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change 如果将消息存储在日志或死信队列中，则应定期清除队列，以删除不再需要的消息。If you store messages in a journal or dead-letter queue, you should periodically clear the queue to remove messages that are no longer needed. 此类队列中的消息将计入队列所在的计算机的消息配额。Messages in such a queue count toward the message quota for the computer where the queue resides. （管理员设置计算机配额。）(The administrator sets the computer quota.) 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供对消息队列消息存储限制的访问权限，它与管理员定义的计算机消息配额不同。The provides access to the Message Queuing message storage limit, which is separate from the computer's message quota that the administrator defines. 有关消息配额的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about the message quota, see . 设置此属性将修改 "消息队列" 队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，此更改会影响任何其他 实例Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change 如果尝试超过最大队列大小或计算机消息配额，则消息可能会丢失。If an attempt is made to exceed either the maximum queue size or the computer message quota, messages might be lost. 当达到队列配额时，消息队列会通过返回否定确认消息，通知发送应用程序的管理队列是否已满。When the queue quota is reached, Message Queuing notifies the administration queue of the sending application to indicate that the queue is full, by returning a negative acknowledgment message. 在队列中的消息的总大小降至限制以下之前，消息队列将继续发送否定确认。Message Queuing continues to send negative acknowledgments until the total size of the messages in the queue drops below the limit. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#22)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此筛选器是一组用来限制 接收或查看的消息属性的布尔值。This filter is a set of Boolean values restricting the message properties that the receives or peeks. 当 接收或查看来自服务器队列的消息时，它只检索 `true`了 值的属性。When the receives or peeks a message from the server queue, it retrieves only those properties for which the value is `true`. 下面显示了 属性的初始属性值。The following shows initial property values for the property. 这些设置与对 调用 完全相同。These settings are identical to calling on a . |属性Property|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||1024字节1024 bytes| ||255字节255 bytes| ||255字节255 bytes| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 来限制接收的消息属性。The following code example uses the to restrict the message properties received. summary.span: 获取或设置与队列关联的多路广播地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the multicast address associated with the queue.

Docs.value:
包含有效的多路广播地址（格式如下）的 ，或者为 ，这表示队列与多路广播地址不关联。A that contains a valid multicast address (in the form shown below) or , which indicates that the queue is not associated with a multicast address.
``` <address>:<port> ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于将非事务性队列与发送消息时可以使用的多播地址相关联。The property is used to associate a non-transactional queue with a multicast address that can be used when sending messages. 不能将事务性队列与多路广播地址相关联。You cannot associate a transactional queue with a multicast address. 当发送应用程序向多播地址发送消息时，消息队列会将该消息的副本发送到与该地址关联的每个队列。When the sending application sends messages to a multicast address, Message Queuing sends a copy of the message to every queue associated with that address. IP 多播地址必须在从224.0.0.0 到239.255.255.255 的 D 类范围内，这相当于设置前四个高序位等于1110。IP multicast addresses must be in the class D range from 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255, which corresponds to setting the first four high-order bits equal to 1110. 不过，只有此范围内的某些地址不会被保留，并且可用于发送多播消息。However, only certain ranges of addresses in this range are unreserved and available for sending multicast messages. 有关保留的多播地址的最新列表，请参阅[Internet 号码分配机构（IANA） Internet 多播地址](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=3859)网页。For the latest list of reserved multicast addresses, see the [Internet Assigned Number Authority (IANA) Internet Multicast Addresses](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=3859) Web page. 端口号没有限制。There are no restrictions on the port number. 如果多台源计算机发送多播消息，并且你希望特定队列仅接收来自一台源计算机的消息，则每个源计算机必须将消息发送到不同的 IP 地址和端口号组合。If several source computers are sending multicast messages and you want a specific queue to receive messages from only one source computer, each source computer must send messages to a different combination of IP address and port number. 若要将队列与多播地址取消关联，请将 属性设置为长度为零的字符串。To dissociate a queue from a multicast address, set the property to a zero-length string. 不要将其设置为 `null`，因为这会导致 。Do not set it to `null`, as this will result in a . 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo|
