remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的语法取决于它所指向的队列的类型，如下表所示。The syntax for the property depends on the type of queue it points to, as shown in the following table. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日志队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机日志队列Machine journal queue|`MachineName`\\`Journal$`| |计算机死信队列Machine dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |计算机事务性死信队列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`MachineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 使用 "." 表示本地计算机。Use "." to represent the local computer. 、和 属性是相关的。The , , and properties are related. 更改 属性会导致 属性发生更改。Changing the property causes the property to change. 它是从新的 和 生成的。It is built from the new and the . 更改 （例如，使用格式名语法）将重置 并 属性以引用新队列。Changing the (for example, to use the format name syntax) resets the and properties to refer to the new queue. 或者，您可以使用 或 来描述队列路径，如下表所示。Alternatively, you can use the or to describe the queue path, as shown in the following table. |参考Reference|语法Syntax|示例Example| |---------------|------------|-------------| |格式名称Format name|`FormatName:` [*格式名*]`FormatName:` [ *format name* ]|`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112`FormatName:Public=` 5A5F7535-AE9A-41d4-935C-845C2AFF7112| |LabelLabel|`Label:` [ *label* ]`Label:` [ *label* ]|`Label:` TheLabel`Label:` TheLabel| 如果在发送消息时使用 属性的标签语法，则当 不唯一时，将引发异常。If you use the label syntax for the property when you send the message, an exception will be thrown if the is not unique. 若要脱机工作，必须使用格式名语法，而不是第一个表中的友好名称语法。To work offline, you must use the format name syntax, rather than the friendly name syntax in the first table. 否则，会引发异常，因为主域控制器（在其上 Active Directory）无法解析到格式名称的路径。Otherwise, an exception is thrown because the primary domain controller (on which Active Directory resides) is not available to resolve the path to the format name. 设置新路径将关闭消息队列并释放所有句柄。Setting a new path closes the message queue and releases all handles. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| > [!NOTE] > 在工作组模式下，只能使用专用队列。In workgroup mode you can only use private queues. 使用专用队列语法指定路径 `MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`。You specify the path using the private queue syntax `MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用各种路径名称语法类型创建新的 对象。The following code example creates new objects using various path name syntax types. 在每种情况下，它会将消息发送到其路径在构造函数中定义的队列。In each case, it sends a message to the queue whose path is defined in the constructor. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CPP/mqpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/CS/mqpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Path#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Path/VB/mqpath.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message Peek() cil managed

summary.span: 返回但不移除（查看）此 所引用的队列中的第一条消息。

span.span: Returns without removing (peeks) the first message in the queue referenced by this .

summary.span: 方法是同步的，所以在有可用消息前，该方法阻塞当前线程。

span.span: The method is synchronous, so it blocks the current thread until a message becomes available.

returns.span: 该 表示队列中第一条消息。

span.span: The that represents the first message in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载可查看队列，或等待队列中存在消息。Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait until a message exists in the queue. 方法从队列中读取但不删除第一条消息。The method reads, but does not remove, the first message from the queue. 因此，对 的重复调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。Therefore, repeated calls to return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 另一方面， 方法会读取和删除队列中的第一条消息。The method, on the other hand, both reads and removes the first message from the queue. 因此，对 的重复调用将返回不同的消息。Repeated calls to , therefore, return different messages. 消息队列根据优先级和到达时间对队列中的消息进行排序。Message Queuing orders messages in the queue according to priority and arrival time. 仅当较高优先级的消息超过较高优先级时，才会将其放在旧消息之前。A newer message is placed before an older one only if it is of a higher priority. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 由于此重载未指定超时，因此应用程序可能会无限期等待。Because this overload does not specify a time-out, the application might wait indefinitely. 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous method. 或者，您可以通过使用指定超时的 的重载来指定消息到达队列的超时时间。Alternatively, you can specify a time-out for a message to arrive in the queue by using the overload of that specifies a time-out. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的示例对队列使用 方法。The following examples use the method on a queue. 在第一个示例中，应用程序会等待，直到队列中有可用的消息。In the first example, the application waits until a message becomes available in the queue. 请注意，第一个示例不会访问到达的消息;它只是暂停处理直到消息到达。Note that the first example does not access the message that arrives; it merely pauses processing until a message arrives. 如果消息已在队列中存在，它将立即返回。If a message already exists in the queue, it will return immediately. 在第二个示例中，包含应用程序定义的 `Order` 类的消息将发送到队列，然后从队列扫视。In the second example, a message that contains an application-defined `Order` class is sent to the queue, and then peeked from the queue. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Peek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_noparms/CPP/mqpeek_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Peek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_noparms/CS/mqpeek_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Peek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_noparms/VB/mqpeek_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载可查看队列，或在队列中存在消息之前等待指定的时间段。Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait a specified period of time until a message exists in the queue. 如果队列中已经存在消息，则该方法立即返回。The method returns immediately if a message already exists in the queue. 方法从队列中读取但不删除第一条消息。The method reads, but does not remove, the first message from the queue. 因此，对 的重复调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。Therefore, repeated calls to return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 另一方面， 方法会读取和删除队列中的第一条消息。The method, on the other hand, both reads and removes the first message from the queue. 因此，对 的重复调用将返回不同的消息。Repeated calls to , therefore, return different messages. 消息队列根据优先级和到达时间对队列中的消息进行排序。Message Queuing orders messages in the queue according to priority and arrival time. 仅当较高优先级的消息超过较高优先级时，才会将其放在旧消息之前。A newer message is placed before an older one only if it is of a higher priority. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 线程将在指定时间段内被阻塞，或在指定 的情况下无限期阻塞。The thread will be blocked up to the specified period of time, or indefinitely if you indicated . 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous method. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用超时值为零的 方法来检查队列是否为空。The following code example uses the method with a time-out of zero to check whether the queue is empty. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Peek_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_timeout/CPP/mqpeek_timeout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Peek_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_timeout/CS/mqpeek_timeout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Peek_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Peek_timeout/VB/mqpeek_timeout.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载可查看队列，或在队列中存在消息之前等待指定的时间段。Use this overload to peek a queue, or to wait a specified period of time until a message exists in the queue. 如果队列中已经存在消息，则该方法立即返回。The method returns immediately if a message already exists in the queue. 方法从队列中读取消息，但不从队列中移除消息。The method reads, but does not remove, a message from the queue. 另一方面， 方法会读取和删除队列中的消息。The method, on the other hand, both reads and removes a message from the queue. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 如果在指定的时间段内阻塞线程，则为; 如果你指示 ，则为无限期。The thread is blocked up to the specified period of time, or indefinitely if you indicated . 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous method. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在 引用的队列中查找 与指定 `correlationId` 参数匹配的消息。This method looks in the queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果未找到与 `correlationID` 参数匹配的消息，则会引发异常。If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, an exception is thrown. 属性用于将发送到队列的消息绑定到关联的响应、报告或确认消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 另外两种方法允许您查看队列中的消息。Two other methods allow you to peek messages in a queue. 方法返回队列中的第一条消息， 方法用于通过指定消息的唯一标识符来检索消息。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例在队列中发送和接收包含订单的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 当原始消息到达或从队列中检索时，它专门请求肯定确认。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在 引用的队列中查找 与指定 `correlationId` 参数匹配的消息。This method looks in the queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果未找到与 `correlationID` 参数匹配的消息，并且在 `timeout` 参数所指定的时间段内，队列中没有新消息到达，则会引发异常。If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, and no new message arrives in the queue within the period specified by the `timeout` parameter, an exception is thrown. `timeout` 参数未指定此方法的总运行时间。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定等待新消息到达队列的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次收到新消息时，此方法将检查新消息的 ，以确定它是否与 `correlationId` 参数匹配。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `correlationId` parameter. 否则，此方法将启动超时期限并等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息在超时期限内继续到达，则此方法可能会无限期地继续运行，直到超时期限过期，无需收到任何新消息，或直到到达其 与 `correlationId` 参数匹配的消息。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `correlationId` parameter. 属性用于将发送到队列的消息绑定到关联的响应、报告或确认消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 另外两种方法允许您查看队列中的消息。Two other methods allow you to peek messages in a queue. 方法返回队列中的第一条消息， 方法用于通过指定消息的唯一标识符来检索消息。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 读取，而不从队列中删除，这是具有已知消息标识符的消息。Use to read, without removing from the queue, a message that has a known message identifier. 消息标识符在消息队列企业中是唯一的，因此队列中最多只能有一条消息与给定的 `id` 参数匹配。The identifier of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter. 如果队列当前不包含消息，此重载将引发异常。This overload throws an exception if the queue does not currently contain the message. 另外两种方法允许您查看队列中的消息： 和 。Two additional methods allow you to peek messages in a queue: and . 方法返回队列中的第一条消息; 返回确认、报告或应用程序生成的响应消息，该消息是作为发送到队列的消息的结果创建的。The method returns the first message in the queue; returns an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 读取，而不从队列中删除，这是具有已知消息标识符的消息。Use to read, without removing from the queue, a message that has a known message identifier. 消息标识符在消息队列企业中是唯一的，因此队列中最多只能有一条消息与给定的 `id` 参数匹配。The identifier of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter. 如果队列当前不包含该消息，并且在发生超时之前没有新消息到达，此重载将引发异常。This overload throws an exception if the queue does not currently contain the message and a new message does not arrive before the time-out occurs. `timeout` 参数未指定此方法的总运行时间。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定等待新消息到达队列的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次收到新消息时，此方法将检查新消息的 ，以确定它是否与 `id` 参数匹配。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `id` parameter. 否则，此方法将启动超时期限并等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息在超时期限内继续到达，则此方法可能会无限期地继续运行，直到超时期限过期，无需收到任何新消息，或直到到达其 与 `id` 参数匹配的消息。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `id` parameter. 另外两种方法允许您查看队列中的消息： 和 。Two additional methods allow you to peek messages in a queue: and . 方法返回队列中的第一条消息; remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以读取具有已知查找标识符的消息，而无需将其从队列中删除。Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier without removing it from the queue. 如果消息不在队列中，此方法会立即引发异常。This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue. 消息的 属性是消息所在的队列独有的，因此队列中最多存在一个与给定 `lookupId` 参数匹配的消息。The property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息并将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read a message with a specified identifier and remove it from the queue, use the method. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当队列中有消息时，将在异步处理中使用 引发 事件。 is used in asynchronous processing to raise the event when a message is available in the queue. 用于完成对 的调用启动的操作，并在引发 事件时查看该消息。 is used to complete the operation initiated by a call to and peek the message when the event is raised. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为 `MyPeekCompleted`的事件处理程序，并将其附加到 事件处理程序委托，并调用 对位于路径 ".\myQueue" 的队列启动异步查看操作。The following code example creates an event handler named `MyPeekCompleted`, attaches it to the event handler delegate, and calls to initiate an asynchronous peek operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue". 引发 事件时，该示例将扫视消息，并将其正文写入屏幕。When a event is raised, the example peeks the message and writes its body to the screen. 然后，该示例再次调用 ，以启动新的异步查看操作The example then calls again to initiate a new asynchronous peek operation [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/CPP/mqbeginpeek_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/CS/mqbeginpeek_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.BeginPeek_noparms/VB/mqbeginpeek_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除队列会导致消息队列设置队列修改标志，这会影响 属性。Purging the queue causes Message Queuing to set the queue modification flag, which affects the property. 从队列中清除的消息丢失;它们不会发送到死信队列或日记队列。Messages that are purged from the queue are lost; they are not sent to the dead-letter queue or the journal queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将 与 结合使用，为队列创建友好的 名称。You can combine the with the to create a friendly name for the queue. 属性的友好名称变体的语法取决于队列的类型，如下表所示。The syntax for the friendly name variation of the property depends on the type of queue, as shown in the following table. |队列类型Queue type|语法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用队列Public queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`| |专用队列Private queue|`MachineName`\\`Private$`\\`QueueName`| |日志队列Journal queue|`MachineName`\\`QueueName`\\`Journal$`| 使用 "." 表示本地计算机。Use "." to represent the local computer. 更改 属性会影响 属性。Changing the property affects the property. 如果在设置 时未设置 属性， 属性将变为。\\`QueueName`。If you set the without setting the property, the property becomes .\\`QueueName`. 否则， 将变成 `MachineName`\\`QueueName`。Otherwise, the becomes `MachineName`\\`QueueName`. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|是Yes| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供消息队列对象的本机 Windows 句柄，该句柄用于扫视和接收来自队列的消息。The provides a native Windows handle to the message queue object that is used for peeking and receiving messages from the queue. 如果更改队列的路径，将关闭句柄，并使用新值重新打开。If you change the path of the queue, the handle is closed and reopened with a new value. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载接收队列中的消息，或等待队列中有消息。Use this overload to receive a message from a queue, or wait until there are messages in the queue. 方法允许同步读取消息，从而将其从队列中删除。The method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, thereby removing it from the queue. 对 的后续调用将返回队列中后面的消息，或新的优先级较高的消息。Subsequent calls to will return the messages that follow in the queue, or new, higher priority messages. 若要读取队列中的第一条消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则可以使用调用 。Use a call to when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 由于 方法的此重载指定无限超时，因此应用程序可能会无限期等待。Because this overload of the method specifies an infinite time-out, the application might wait indefinitely. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待消息，请考虑使用异步方法 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for the message, consider using the asynchronous method, . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例接收队列中的消息，并将有关该消息的信息输出到屏幕。The following code example receives a message from a queue and outputs information about that message to the screen. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/CPP/mqreceive_noparms.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/CS/mqreceive_noparms.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Receive_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_noparms/VB/mqreceive_noparms.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载从事务性队列中接收消息，该消息使用由 `transaction` 参数定义的内部事务上下文，或者等到队列中有消息。Use this overload to receive a message from a transactional queue using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter, or wait until there are messages in the queue. 方法允许同步读取消息，从而将其从队列中删除。The method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, thereby removing it from the queue. 对 的后续调用将返回队列中后面的消息。Subsequent calls to will return the messages that follow in the queue. 由于此方法是在事务队列中调用的，因此，如果事务中止，接收到的消息将返回到队列。Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 在提交事务之前，不会从队列中永久删除该消息。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 若要读取队列中的第一条消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用 返回的消息相关联的事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 由于 不会删除队列中的任何消息，因此调用 将不会回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back by a call to . 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则可以使用调用 。Use a call to when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 由于 方法的此重载指定无限超时，因此应用程序可能会无限期等待。Because this overload of the method specifies an infinite time-out, the application might wait indefinitely. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待消息，请考虑使用异步方法 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for the message, consider using the asynchronous method, . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例连接到本地计算机上的事务队列，并将消息发送到队列。The following code example connects to a transactional queue on the local computer and sends a message to the queue. 然后，它将接收包含订单的消息。It then receives the message that contains an order. 如果遇到非事务性队列，它将引发并引发异常并回滚事务。If it encounters a non-transactional queue, it will throw and exception and rollback the transaction. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Receive_transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_transaction/CPP/mqreceive_transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Receive_transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_transaction/CS/mqreceive_transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Receive_transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_transaction/VB/mqreceive_transaction.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载通过 `transactionType` 参数定义的事务上下文从队列接收消息，或等待队列中有消息。Use this overload to receive a message from a queue using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter, or wait until there are messages in the queue. 如果已存在附加到要用于接收消息的线程的外部事务上下文，请指定 `transactionType` 参数 `Automatic`。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 如果要将消息作为单个内部事务接收，请指定 `Single`。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 如果要在事务上下文之外接收来自事务性队列的消息，可以指定 `None`。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 方法允许同步读取消息，从而将其从队列中删除。The method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, thereby removing it from the queue. 对 的后续调用将返回队列中后面的消息。Subsequent calls to will return the messages that follow in the queue. 如果调用此方法来接收来自事务性队列的消息，则在事务中止时，收到的消息将返回到队列。If this method is called to receive a message from a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 在提交事务之前，不会从队列中永久删除该消息。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 若要读取队列中的第一条消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用 返回的消息相关联的事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 由于 不会删除队列中的任何消息，因此调用 将不会回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back by a call to . 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则可以使用调用 。Use a call to when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 由于 方法的此重载指定无限超时，因此应用程序可能会无限期等待。Because this overload of the method specifies an infinite time-out, the application might wait indefinitely. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待消息，请考虑使用异步方法 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for the message, consider using the asynchronous method, . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载接收消息并在队列中没有消息时在指定的时间段内返回。Use this overload to receive a message and return in a specified period of time if there are no messages in the queue. 方法允许同步读取消息，并将其从队列中删除。The method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, removing it from the queue. 对 的后续调用将返回队列中后面的消息，或新的优先级较高的消息。Subsequent calls to will return the messages that follow in the queue, or new, higher priority messages. 若要读取队列中的第一条消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则可以使用调用 。Use a call to when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 如果为 `timeout` 参数指定了值 ，则线程将在给定的时间段内被阻止，或无限期地被阻止。The thread will be blocked for the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value for the `timeout` parameter. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待消息，请考虑使用异步方法 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for a message, consider using the asynchronous method, . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例接收队列中的消息，并将有关该消息的信息输出到屏幕。The following code example receives a message from a queue and outputs information about that message to the screen. 该示例在等待消息到达队列时，暂停执行最多5秒。The example pauses execution for up to five seconds while waiting for a message to arrive in the queue. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Receive_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_timeout/CPP/mqreceive_timeout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Receive_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_timeout/CS/mqreceive_timeout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Receive_timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Receive_timeout/VB/mqreceive_timeout.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Messaging.Message Receive (TimeSpan timeout, System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction transaction);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message Receive(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction transaction) cil managed
Public Function Receive (timeout As TimeSpan, transaction As MessageQueueTransaction) As Message

param.name: timeout
param.span: 一个 指示有新消息可用于检查之前等待的时间。

span.span: A that indicates the time to wait until a new message is available for inspection.

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对象。

span.span: The object.

summary.span: 接收由 引用的事务性队列中的第一条可用消息，并且一直等到队列中有可用消息或超时过期。

span.span: Receives the first message available in the transactional queue referenced by the and waits until either a message is available in the queue, or the time-out expires.

returns.span: ，它引用队列中可用的第一条消息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载从事务性队列中接收消息，该消息使用由 `transaction` 参数定义的内部事务上下文，并在队列中没有消息的指定时间段内返回。Use this overload to receive a message from a transactional queue using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter, and return within a specified period of time if there are no messages in the queue. 方法允许同步读取消息，从而将其从队列中删除。The method allows for the synchronous reading of a message, thereby removing it from the queue. 对 的后续调用将返回队列中后面的消息。Subsequent calls to will return the messages that follow in the queue. 由于此方法是在事务队列中调用的，因此，如果事务中止，接收到的消息将返回到队列。Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 在提交事务之前，不会从队列中永久删除该消息。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 若要读取队列中的第一条消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read the first message in a queue without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用 返回的消息相关联的事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 由于 不会删除队列中的任何消息，因此调用 将不会回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back by a call to . 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则可以使用调用 。Use a call to when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 如果为 `timeout` 参数指定了值 ，则线程将在给定的时间段内被阻止，或无限期地被阻止。The thread will be blocked for the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value for the `timeout` parameter. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待消息，请考虑使用异步方法 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for a message, consider using the asynchronous method, . 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of this method. subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用 返回的消息相关联的事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 如果为 `timeout` 参数指定了值 ，则线程将在给定的时间段内被阻止，或无限期地被阻止。The thread will be blocked for the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value for the `timeout` parameter. 如果应用程序处理应继续而不等待消息，请考虑使用异步方法 。If the application processing should continue without waiting for a message, consider span.span: Receives the message that matches the given correlation identifier (from a non-transactional queue) and immediately raises an exception if no message with the specified correlation identifier currently exists in the queue.

returns.span: 其 匹配传入的 参数的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在 引用的非事务性队列中查找 与指定 `correlationId` 参数匹配的消息。This method looks in the non-transactional queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果未找到与 `correlationID` 参数匹配的消息，则会引发异常。If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, an exception is thrown. 否则，将从队列中删除该消息并将其返回给应用程序。Otherwise, the message is removed from the queue and returned to the application. 属性用于将发送到队列的消息绑定到关联的响应、报告或确认消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 另外两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回队列中的第一条消息， 方法通过指定消息的唯一标识符来检索消息。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method retrieves a message by specifying its unique identifier. 若要读取具有指定相关标识符的消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read a message with a specified correlation identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例在队列中发送和接收包含订单的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 当原始消息到达或从队列中检索时，它专门请求肯定确认。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在 引用的事务性队列中查找 与指定 `correlationId` 参数匹配的消息。This method looks in the transactional queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果未找到与 `correlationID` 参数匹配的消息，则会引发异常。If no message is found that matches the `correlationID` parameter, an exception is thrown. 否则，将从队列中删除该消息，并使用 `transaction` 参数定义的内部事务上下文将该消息返回到应用程序。Otherwise, the message is removed from the queue and returned to the application using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 由于此方法是在事务队列中调用的，因此，如果事务中止，接收到的消息将返回到队列。Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 在提交事务之前，不会从队列中永久删除该消息。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 属性用于将发送到队列的消息绑定到关联的响应、报告或确认消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 另外两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回队列中的第一条消息， 方法用于通过指定消息的唯一标识符来检索消息。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. 若要读取具有指定相关标识符的消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read a message with a specified correlation identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用 返回的消息相关联的事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 由于 不会删除队列中的任何消息，因此，如果事务中止，则不会回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在 引用的非事务性队列中查找 与指定 `correlationId` 参数匹配的消息。This method looks in the non-transactional queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果具有 `correlationId` 参数指定的相关标识符的消息在队列中，则此方法立即返回。This method returns immediately if the message with the correlation identifier specified by the `correlationId` parameter is in the queue. 否则，该方法将在给定的时间段内等待新消息到达。Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive. 如果新消息在超时过期之前未到达，则会引发异常。If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown. `timeout` 参数未指定此方法的总运行时间。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定等待新消息到达队列的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次收到新消息时，此方法将检查新消息的 ，以确定它是否与 `correlationId` 参数匹配。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `correlationId` parameter. 否则，此方法将启动超时期限并等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息在超时期限内继续到达，则此方法可能会无限期地继续运行，直到超时期限过期，无需收到任何新消息，或直到到达其 与 `correlationId` 参数匹配的消息。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `correlationId` parameter. 属性用于将发送到队列的消息绑定到关联的响应、报告或确认消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 另外两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回队列中的第一条消息， 方法用于通过指定消息的唯一标识符来检索消息。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. 若要读取具有指定相关标识符的消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read a message with a specified correlation identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| message with a specified correlation identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用 返回的消息相关联的事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 由于 不会删除队列中的任何消息，因此，如果事务中止，则不会回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. public: System::Messaging::Message ^ ReceiveByCorrelationId(System::String ^ correlationId, TimeSpan timeout, System::Messaging::MessageQueueTransactionType transactionType);

param.name: correlationId

summary.span: 接收与给定的相关标识符匹配的消息，并且一直等到队列中出现具有指定相关标识符的消息或超时过期。

span.span: Receives the message that matches the given correlation identifier and waits until either a message with the specified correlation identifier is available in the queue, or the time-out expires.

returns.span: 其 匹配传入的 参数的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在 引用的队列中查找 与指定 `correlationId` 参数匹配的消息。This method looks in the queue referenced by the for a message whose matches the specified `correlationId` parameter. 如果具有 `correlationId` 参数指定的相关标识符的消息在队列中，则使用 `transactionType` 参数定义的事务上下文来立即返回此方法。This method returns immediately if the message with the correlation identifier specified by the `correlationId` parameter is in the queue, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 否则，该方法将在给定的时间段内等待新消息到达。Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive. 如果新消息在超时过期之前未到达，则会引发异常。If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown. `timeout` 参数未指定此方法的总运行时间。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定等待新消息到达队列的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次收到新消息时，此方法将检查新消息的 ，以确定它是否与 `correlationId` 参数匹配。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `correlationId` parameter. 否则，此方法将启动超时期限并等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息在超时期限内继续到达，则此方法可能会无限期地继续运行，直到超时期限过期，无需收到任何新消息，或直到到达其 与 `correlationId` 参数匹配的消息。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `correlationId` parameter. 如果已存在附加到要用于接收消息的线程的外部事务上下文，请指定 `transactionType` 参数 `Automatic`。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 如果要将消息作为单个内部事务接收，请指定 `Single`。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 如果要在事务上下文之外接收来自事务性队列的消息，可以指定 `None`。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 如果调用此方法来接收来自事务性队列的消息，则在事务中止时，收到的消息将返回到队列。If this method is called to receive a message from a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 在提交事务之前，不会从队列中永久删除该消息。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 属性用于将发送到队列的消息绑定到关联的响应、报告或确认消息。The property is used to tie a message sent to the queue to associated response, report, or acknowledgment messages. 另外两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回队列中的第一条消息， 方法用于通过指定消息的唯一标识符来检索消息。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve a message by specifying its unique identifier. 若要读取具有指定相关标识符的消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read a message with a specified correlation identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用 返回的消息相关联的事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 由于 不会删除队列中的任何消息，因此，如果事务中止，则不会回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以读取具有已知标识符的消息，并将其从队列中删除。Use this method to read a message with a known identifier and remove it from the queue. 如果消息不在队列中，此方法会立即引发异常。This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue. 消息的 属性在消息队列企业中是唯一的，因此队列中最多只有一条消息与给定的 `id` 参数匹配。The property of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter. 另外两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回队列中的第一条消息， 方法用于检索确认、报告或应用程序生成的响应消息，该消息是作为发送到队列的消息的结果创建的。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以读取具有已知标识符的消息，并将其从队列中删除。Use this method to read a message with a known identifier and remove it from the queue. 如果具有 `id` 参数指定的标识符的消息在队列中，则此方法立即返回。This method returns immediately if the message with the identifier specified by the `id` parameter is in the queue. 否则，该方法将在给定的时间段内等待新消息到达。Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive. 如果新消息在超时过期之前未到达，则会引发异常。If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown. `timeout` 参数未指定此方法的总运行时间。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定等待新消息到达队列的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次收到新消息时，此方法将检查新消息的 ，以确定它是否与 `id` 参数匹配。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `id` parameter. 否则，此方法将启动超时期限并等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息在超时期限内继续到达，则此方法可能会无限期地继续运行，直到超时期限过期，无需收到任何新消息，或直到到达其 与 `id` 参数匹配的消息。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `id` parameter. 消息的 属性在消息队列企业中是唯一的，因此队列中最多只有一条消息与给定的 `id` 参数匹配。The property of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter. 当当前线程被阻止时，可以使用 的此重载，只要新消息在 `timeout` 参数指定的超时期限内继续到达队列中即可。Use this overload of when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked as long as new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter. 如果为 `timeout` 参数指定了值 ，或者在 `timeout` 参数指定的超时期限内新消息仍到达队列，则该线程将在至少给定的时间段内被阻止。The thread will be blocked for at least the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value for the `timeout` parameter, or if new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter. 另外两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回队列中的第一条消息， 方法用于检索确认、报告或应用程序生成的响应消息，该消息是作为发送到队列的消息的结果创建的。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非队列中有较高优先级的消息到达。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以读取具有已知标识符的消息，并使用 `transaction` 参数定义的内部事务上下文从队列中删除该消息。Use this method to read a message with a known identifier and remove it from the queue, using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 如果具有 `id` 参数指定的标识符的消息在队列中，则此方法立即返回。This method returns immediately if the message with the identifier specified by the `id` parameter is in the queue. 否则，该方法将在给定的时间段内等待新消息到达。Otherwise, the method waits the given period of time for a new message to arrive. 如果新消息在超时过期之前未到达，则会引发异常。If a new message does not arrive before the time-out expires, an exception is thrown. `timeout` 参数未指定此方法的总运行时间。The `timeout` parameter does not specify the total running time for this method. 相反，它指定等待新消息到达队列的时间。Rather, it specifies the time to wait for a new message to arrive in the queue. 每次收到新消息时，此方法将检查新消息的 ，以确定它是否与 `id` 参数匹配。Each time a new message arrives, this method examines the of the new message to see if it matches the `id` parameter. 否则，此方法将启动超时期限并等待另一个新消息到达。If not, this method starts the time-out period over and waits for another new message to arrive. 因此，如果新消息在超时期限内继续到达，则此方法可能会无限期地继续运行，直到超时期限过期，无需收到任何新消息，或直到到达其 与 `id` 参数匹配的消息。Therefore, if new messages continue to arrive within the time-out period, it is possible for this method to continue running indefinitely, either until the time-out period expires without any new messages arriving, or until a message arrives whose matches the `id` parameter. 消息的 属性在消息队列企业中是唯一的，因此队列中最多只有一条消息与给定的 `id` 参数匹配。The property of a message is unique across the Message Queuing enterprise, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `id` parameter. 当当前线程被阻止时，可以使用 的此重载，只要新消息在 `timeout` 参数指定的超时期限内继续到达队列中即可。Use this overload of when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked as long as new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the time-out period specified by the `timeout` parameter. 如果为 `timeout` 参数指定了值 ，或者在 `timeout` 参数指定的超时期限内，新消息仍到达队列，则该线程将在至少给定的时间段内被阻止。The thread will be blocked for at least the given period of time, or indefinitely if you specified the value for the `timeout` parameter, or if new messages continue to arrive in the queue within the timeout period specified by the `timeout` parameter. 由于此方法是在事务队列中调用的，因此，如果事务中止，接收到的消息将返回到队列。Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 在提交事务之前，不会从队列中永久删除该消息。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 另外两种方法可用于从队列接收消息。Two other methods allow you to receive messages from a queue. 方法返回队列中的第一条消息， 方法用于检索确认、报告或应用程序生成的响应消息，该消息是作为发送到队列的消息的结果创建的。The method returns the first message in the queue, and the method is used to retrieve an acknowledgment, report, or application-generated response message that was created as a result of a message sent to the queue. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 方法始终返回队列中的第一条消息，因此，对方法的后续调用将返回相同的消息，除非在队列中到达较高优先级的消息。The method always returns the first message in the queue, so subsequent calls to the method return the same message, unless a higher priority message arrives in the queue. 没有与通过调用 返回的消息相关联的事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 由于 不会删除队列中的任何消息，因此，如果事务中止，则不会回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages in the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以读取具有已知查找标识符的消息，并使用 `transaction` 参数定义的事务上下文从队列中删除该消息。Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier and remove it from the queue, using a transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 如果消息不在队列中，此方法会立即引发异常。This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue. 消息的 属性是消息所在的队列独有的，因此队列中最多存在一个与给定 `lookupId` 参数匹配的消息。The property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter. 由于此方法是在事务队列中调用的，因此，如果事务中止，接收到的消息将返回到队列。Because this method is called on a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 在提交事务之前，不会从队列中永久删除该消息。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 没有与通过调用 返回的消息相关联的事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 由于 不会从队列中删除任何消息，因此，如果事务中止，则不会回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages from the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以读取具有已知查找标识符的消息，并使用 `transactionType` 参数定义的事务上下文从队列中删除该消息。Use this method to read a message with a known lookup identifier and remove it from the queue, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 如果消息不在队列中，此方法会立即引发异常。This method throws an exception immediately if the message is not in the queue. 消息的 属性是消息所在的队列独有的，因此队列中最多存在一个与给定 `lookupId` 参数匹配的消息。The property of a message is unique to the queue where the message resides, so there will be at most one message in the queue that matches the given `lookupId` parameter. 若要读取具有指定标识符的消息而不将其从队列中删除，请使用 方法。To read a message with a specified identifier without removing it from the queue, use the method. 没有与通过调用 返回的消息相关联的事务上下文。There is no transaction context associated with a message returned by a call to . 由于 不会从队列中删除任何消息，因此，如果事务中止，则不会回滚任何内容。Because does not remove any messages from the queue, there would be nothing to roll back if the transaction were aborted. 如果已存在附加到要用于接收消息的线程的外部事务上下文，请指定 `transactionType` 参数 `Automatic`。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 如果要将消息作为单个内部事务接收，请指定 `Single`。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 如果要在事务上下文之外接收来自事务性队列的消息，可以指定 `None`。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 如果调用此方法来接收来自事务性队列的消息，则在事务中止时，收到的消息将返回到队列。If this method is called to receive a message from a transactional queue, the message that is received would be returned to the queue if the transaction is aborted. 在提交事务之前，不会从队列中永久删除该消息。The message is not permanently removed from the queue until the transaction is committed. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ReceiveCompleted As ReceiveCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 在从队列移除某条消息后发生。

span.span: Occurs when a message has been removed from the queue.

summary.span: 此事件由异步操作 引发。

span.span: This event is raised by the asynchronous operation, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当队列中有消息时，将在异步处理中使用 引发 事件。 is used in asynchronous processing to raise the event when a message is available in the queue. 用于完成对 的调用启动的操作，并在引发 事件时查看该消息。 is used to complete the operation initiated by a call to and peek the message when the event is raised. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为 `MyReceiveCompleted`的事件处理程序，并将其附加到 事件处理程序委托，并调用 以便在位于路径 ".\myQueue" 的队列上启动异步接收操作。The following code example creates an event handler named `MyReceiveCompleted`, attaches it to the event handler delegate, and calls to initiate an asynchronous receive operation on the queue that is located at the path ".\myQueue". 引发 事件时，该示例接收消息，并将其正文写入屏幕。When a event is raised, the example receives the message and writes its body to the screen. 然后，该示例再次调用 ，以启动新的异步接收操作。The example then calls again to initiate a new asynchronous receive operation. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted/CPP/mqreceivecompletedeventhandler.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted/CS/mqreceivecompletedeventhandler.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted/VB/mqreceivecompletedeventhandler.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 时，会将权限列表返回到其默认值。When you call , you return the permission list to its default values. 通常，这会授予队列创建者所有权限，并为每个人提供以下权限：Generally, this grants the queue creator all permissions, and gives the group Everyone the following rights: - 获取队列属性。Get the properties of the queue. - 获取队列权限。Get queue permissions. - 写入队列。Write to the queue. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载将包含 `obj` 参数的消息发送到 引用的队列。Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the queue referenced by the . 发送到队列的对象可以是 或任何托管对象。The object you send to the queue can be a or any managed object. 如果发送除 以外的任何对象，则会序列化对象并将其插入到消息正文中。If you send any object other than a , the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message. 如果使用此重载将消息发送到事务性队列，则会将该消息发送到死信队列。If you use this overload to send a message to a transactional queue, the message will be sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果希望消息成为包含其他消息的事务的一部分，请使用采用 或 作为参数的重载。If you want the message to be part of a transaction that contains other messages, use an overload that takes a or as a parameter. 如果在调用 之前未设置 属性，则格式化程序默认为 。If you do not set the property before calling , the formatter defaults to the . 属性适用于除 以外的任何对象。The property applies to any object other than a . 例如，如果使用 成员指定标签或优先级，则当应用程序将其发送到队列时，这些值将应用于包含不属于类型 对象的任何消息。If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type when your application sends it to the queue. 发送 时，为 设置的属性值优先于 ，消息的 属性优先于队列的 属性。When sending a , the property values set for the take precedence over and the message's property takes precedence over the queue's property. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例连接到消息队列并将消息发送到队列。The following code example connects to a message queue and sends a message to the queue. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.Send_obj#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Send_obj/CPP/mqsend_generic.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.Send_obj#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Send_obj/CS/mqsend_generic.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.Send_obj#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.Send_obj/VB/mqsend_generic.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例将应用程序定义的 `Order` 类发送到队列，然后从该队列接收消息。The following code example sends an application-defined `Order` class to a queue and then receives a message from that queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载通过 `transaction` 参数定义的内部事务上下文将包含 `obj` 参数的消息发送到 引用的事务性队列。Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the transactional queue referenced by the , using an internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 发送到队列的对象可以是 或任何托管对象。The object you send to the queue can be a or any managed object. 如果发送除 以外的任何对象，则会序列化对象并将其插入到消息正文中。If you send any object other than a , the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message. 如果使用此重载将消息发送到非事务性队列，则可能会将该消息发送到死信队列，而不会引发异常。If you use this overload to send a message to a non-transactional queue, the message might be sent to the dead-letter queue without throwing an exception. 如果在调用 之前未设置 属性，则格式化程序默认为 。If you do not set the property before calling , the formatter defaults to the . 属性适用于除 以外的任何对象。The property applies to any object other than a . 例如，如果使用 成员指定标签或优先级，则当应用程序将其发送到队列时，这些值将应用于包含不属于类型 对象的任何消息。If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type when your application sends it to the queue. 发送 时，为 设置的属性值优先于 ，消息的 属性优先于队列的 属性。When sending a , the property values set for the take precedence over and the message's property takes precedence over the queue's property. 是线程单元感知的，因此，如果单元状态为 `STA`，则无法在多个线程中使用事务。 is threading apartment aware, so if your apartment state is `STA`, you cannot use the transaction in multiple threads. Visual Basic 将主线程的状态设置为 `STA`，因此必须在 `Main` 子例程中应用 。Visual Basic sets the state of the main thread to `STA`, so you must apply the in the `Main` subroutine. 否则，利用另一个线程发送事务性消息将引发 异常。Otherwise, sending a transactional message using another thread throws a exception. 使用以下片段应用 。You apply the by using the following fragment. ```vb public sub Main() ``` 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将字符串发送到事务性队列，然后从该队列接收消息。The following code example sends a string to a transactional queue and then receives a message from that queue. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载通过 `transactionType` 参数定义的事务上下文将包含 `obj` 参数的消息发送到 引用的队列。Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the queue referenced by the , using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 如果已存在附加到要用于发送消息的线程的外部事务上下文，请指定 `transactionType` 参数 `Automatic`。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to send the message. 如果要将消息作为单个内部事务发送，请指定 `Single`。Specify `Single` if you want to send the message as a single internal transaction. 如果要将事务性消息发送到非事务性线程，可以指定 `None`。You can specify `None` if you want to send a transactional message to a non-transactional thread. 发送到队列的对象可以是 或任何托管对象。The object you send to the queue can be a or any managed object. 如果发送除 以外的任何对象，则会序列化对象并将其插入到消息正文中。If you send any object other than a , the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message. 如果在调用 之前未设置 属性，则格式化程序默认为 。If you do not set the property before calling , the formatter defaults to the . 属性适用于除 以外的任何对象。The property applies to any object other than a . 例如，如果使用 成员指定标签或优先级，则当应用程序将其发送到队列时，这些值将应用于包含不属于类型 对象的任何消息。If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type when your application sends it to the queue. 发送 时，为 设置的属性值优先于 ，消息的 属性优先于队列的 属性。When sending a , the property values set for the take precedence over and the message's property takes precedence over the queue's property. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . a transactional queue, the message will be sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果希望消息成为包含其他消息的事务的一部分，请使用采用 或 作为参数的重载。If you want the message to be part of a transaction that contains other messages, use an remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载通过 `transaction` 参数定义的内部事务上下文将包含 `obj` 参数的消息发送到 引用的事务性队列。Use this overload to send a message that contains the `obj` parameter to the transactional queue referenced by the , using an internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 利用此重载，可以指定标识消息的字符串标签。With this overload, you can specify the string label that identifies the message. 发送到队列的对象可以是 、结构、数据对象或任何托管对象。The object you send to the queue can be a , a structure, a data object, or any managed object. 如果发送除 以外的任何对象，则会序列化对象并将其插入到消息正文中。If you send any object other than a , the object is serialized and inserted into the body of the message. 消息标签不同于消息队列标签，但两者都依赖于应用程序，并且对消息队列没有继承意义。The message label is distinct from the message queue label, but both are application-dependent and have no inherit meaning to Message Queuing. 如果使用此重载将消息发送到非事务性队列，则可能会将该消息发送到死信队列，而不会引发异常。If you use this overload to send a message to a non-transactional queue, the message might be sent to the dead-letter queue without throwing an exception. 如果在调用 之前未设置 属性，则格式化程序默认为 。If you do not set the property before calling , the formatter defaults to the . 属性适用于除 以外的任何对象。The property applies to any object other than a . 例如，如果使用 成员指定标签或优先级，则当应用程序将其发送到队列时，这些值将应用于包含不属于类型 对象的任何消息。If you specify, for example, a label or a priority using the member, these values apply to any message that contains an object that is not of type when your application sends it to the queue. 发送 时，为 设置的属性值优先于 ，并且消息的 属性优先于队列的 属性When sending a , the property values set for the take precedence over and the message's property takes precedence over the queue's property 是线程单元感知的，因此，如果单元状态为 `STA`，则无法在多个线程中使用事务。 is threading apartment aware, so if your apartment state is `STA`, you cannot use the transaction in multiple threads. Visual Basic 将主线程的状态设置为 `STA`，因此必须在 `Main` 子例程中应用 。Visual Basic sets the state of the main thread to `STA`, so you must apply the in the `Main` subroutine. 否则，利用另一个线程发送事务性消息将引发 异常。Otherwise, sending a transactional message using another thread throws a exception. 使用以下片段应用 。You apply the by using the following fragment. ```vb public sub Main() ``` 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . param.span: ，包含一个或多个指定受信者和要授予的权限的访问控制项。

summary.span: 基于访问控制列表的内容将访问权限分配给队列。

span.span: Assigns access rights to the queue based on the contents of an access control list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载可通过使用访问控制项的集合指定受信者和权限信息来授予、拒绝或撤消权限。Use this overload to grant, deny, or revoke rights by using a collection of access control entries to specify trustee and permissions information. 例如，使用此项可以同时向多个用户授予权限。This is used, for example, to grant permissions to multiple users at the same time. 构造 `ace` 参数时指定的受信者可以是单个用户、用户组或计算机。The trustee you specify when you construct the `ace` parameter can be an individual user, a group of users, or a computer. 如果受信者是个人，请使用格式 `DOMAIN`\\`user`。If the trustee is an individual, use the format `DOMAIN`\\`user`. 您可以为受信者指定 "."，以指示本地计算机。You can specify "." for the trustee to indicate the local computer. 通过 向现有列表添加权限来分配权限。The permissions you assign through add rights to the existing list. 默认情况下，公用或专用队列的创建者具有 "完全控制" 权限，而 "域组" 有权获取队列属性、获取权限和写入队列。By default, the creator of a public or private queue has full control, and the domain group Everyone has permission to get queue properties, get permissions, and write to the queue. 调用 时，用户和权限信息将追加到现有列表的底部。When you call , the user and permissions information is appended to the bottom of the existing list. 系统会按顺序检查每个 ，直到发生以下事件之一：The system examines each in sequence until one of the following events occurs: - 拒绝访问 明确拒绝对线程的访问令牌中列出的某个受信者的任何请求的访问权限。An access-denied explicitly denies any of the requested access rights to one of the trustees listed in the thread's access token. - 线程的访问令牌中列出的受信者的一个或多个允许访问 项显式授予所有请求的访问权限。One or more access-allowed items for trustees listed in the thread's access token explicitly grant all the requested access rights. - 已检查所有 项，但至少有一个请求的访问权限尚未显式允许，在这种情况下，将隐式拒绝访问。All items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied. 构造 `dacl` 参数时，请将 实例添加到 集合。When you construct the `dacl` parameter, you add instances to your collection. 构造每个访问控制项时，可以指定常规或标准访问权限。When you construct each access control entry, you can specify generic or standard access rights. 队列的权限可以是以下各项的任意组合：The rights to a queue can be any combination of the following: - 删除Delete - 读取安全Read Security - 写入安全性Write Security - 同步Synchronize - 修改所有者Modify Owner - 读取Read - WriteWrite - 执行Execute - 必需Required - 全部All - NoneNone 这些权限是可使用或按位运算符组合的一组位标志。These rights are a set of bit flags that you can combine using the OR bitwise operator. - 完全控制Full Control - 删除消息Delete Message - 接收消息Receive Message - 速览消息Peek Message - 接收日志消息Receive Journal Message - 获取队列属性Get Queue Properties - 设置队列属性Set Queue Properties - 获取权限Get Permissions - 设置权限Set Permissions - 获取队列所有权Take Queue Ownership - 写入消息Write Message 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . [!code-cpp[MessageQueue2#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue2/cpp/class1.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue2/CS/class1.cs#26)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载通过访问控制项指定受信者和权限信息来授予、拒绝或撤消权限。Use this overload to grant, deny, or revoke rights by using an access control entry to specify trustee and rights information. 构造 `ace` 参数时指定的受信者可以是单个用户、用户组或计算机。The trustee you specify when you construct the `ace` parameter can be an individual user, a group of users, or a computer. 如果受信者是个人，请使用格式 `DOMAIN`\\`user`。If the trustee is an individual, use the format `DOMAIN`\\`user`. 您可以为受信者指定 "."，以指示本地计算机。You can specify "." for the trustee to indicate the local computer. 通过 向现有列表添加权限来分配权限。The permissions you assign through add rights to the existing list. 默认情况下，公用或专用队列的创建者具有 "完全控制" 权限，而 "域组" 有权获取队列属性、获取权限和写入队列。By default, the creator of a public or private queue has full control, and the domain group Everyone has permission to get queue properties, get permissions, and write to the queue. 调用 时，用户和权限信息将追加到现有列表的底部。When you call , the user and permissions information is appended to the bottom of the existing list. 系统会按顺序检查每个 ，直到发生以下事件之一：The system examines each in sequence until one of the following events occurs: - 拒绝访问 明确拒绝对线程的访问令牌中列出的某个受信者的任何请求的访问权限。An access-denied explicitly denies any of the requested access rights to one of the trustees listed in the thread's access token. - 线程的访问令牌中列出的受信者的一个或多个允许访问 项显式授予所有请求的访问权限。One or more access-allowed items for trustees listed in the thread's access token explicitly grant all the requested access rights. - 已检查所有 项，但至少有一个请求的访问权限尚未显式允许，在这种情况下，将隐式拒绝访问。All items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied. 用于在构造 时在 `rights` 参数中指定的队列的权限，可以是以下任意组合：The rights to a queue, which you specify in the `rights` parameter when you construct your , can be any combination of the following: - 完全控制Full Control - 删除消息Delete Message - 接收消息Receive Message - 速览消息Peek Message - 接收日志消息Receive Journal Message - 获取队列属性Get Queue Properties - 设置队列属性Set Queue Properties - 获取权限Get Permissions - 设置权限Set Permissions - 获取队列所有权Take Queue Ownership - 写入消息Write Message 在 `ace` 参数的构造函数中指定的 `rights` 参数是 枚举的标志。The `rights` parameter you specify in the constructor for the `ace` parameter is a flag of the enumeration. 它表示一组可以使用按位运算符组合或在生成 `rights` 参数时使用的位标志。It represents a set of bit flags that you can combine using the bitwise operator OR when you build the `rights` parameter. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . [!code-cpp[MessageQueue2#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue2/cpp/class1.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue2/CS/class1.cs#24)]
