remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载将指定的权限授予单个用户。Use this overload to grant specified rights to an individual user. 用户可以是任何有效的受信者，其中包括个人用户、用户组或计算机。The user can be any valid trustee, which includes individual users, groups of users, or a computer. 如果用户是个人，则使用 `user` 参数 `DOMAIN`\\`user` 格式。If the user is an individual, use the format `DOMAIN`\\`user` for the `user` parameter. 可以为 `user` 参数指定 "."，以指示本地计算机。You can specify "." for the `user` parameter to indicate the local computer. 通过 向现有列表添加权限来分配权限。The permissions you assign through add rights to the existing list. 默认情况下，公用或专用队列的创建者具有 "完全控制" 权限，而 "域组" 有权获取队列属性、获取权限和写入队列。By default, the creator of a public or private queue has full control, and the domain group Everyone has permission to get queue properties, get permissions, and write to the queue. 调用 时，用户和权限信息将追加到现有列表的底部。When you call , the user and permissions information is appended to the bottom of the existing list. 系统会按顺序检查每个 ，直到发生以下事件之一：The system examines each in sequence until one of the following events occurs: - 拒绝访问 明确拒绝对线程的访问令牌中列出的某个受信者的任何请求的访问权限。An access-denied explicitly denies any of the requested access rights to one of the trustees listed in the thread's access token. - 线程的访问令牌中列出的受信者的一个或多个允许访问 项显式授予所有请求的访问权限。One or more access-allowed items for trustees listed in the thread's access token explicitly grant all the requested access rights. - 已检查所有 项，但至少有一个请求的访问权限尚未显式允许，在这种情况下，将隐式拒绝访问。All items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied. 在 `rights` 参数中指定的队列的权限可以是以下任意组合：The rights to a queue, specified in the `rights` parameter, can be any combination of the following: - 完全控制Full Control - 删除消息Delete Message - 接收消息Receive Message - 速览消息Peek Message - 接收日志消息Receive Journal Message - 获取队列属性Get Queue Properties - 设置队列属性Set Queue Properties - 获取权限Get Permissions - 设置权限Set Permissions - 获取队列所有权Take Queue Ownership - 写入消息Write Message 枚举表示一组可以使用按位运算符组合的位标志，或用于生成 `rights` 参数。The enumeration represents a set of bit flags that you can combine using the bitwise operator OR to build the `rights` parameter. 利用此重载，只能授予权限;不能撤消或拒绝它们。With this overload, you can only grant permissions; you cannot revoke or deny them. 必须使用其他重载显式授予除 `Allow`以外的任何 。You must use a different overload to explicitly grant any other than `Allow`. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . [!code-cpp[MessageQueue2#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue2/cpp/class1.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue2#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue2/CS/class1.cs#23)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载可为单个用户授予、拒绝或撤消指定的权限。Use this overload to grant, deny, or revoke specified rights for an individual user. 用户可以是任何有效的受信者，其中包括个人用户、用户组或计算机。The user can be any valid trustee, which includes individual users, groups of users, or a computer. 如果用户是个人，则使用 `user` 参数 `DOMAIN`\\`user` 格式。If the user is an individual, use the format `DOMAIN`\\`user` for the `user` parameter. 可以为 `user` 参数指定 "."，以指示本地计算机。You can specify "." for the `user` parameter to indicate the local computer. 通过 向现有列表添加权限来分配权限。The permissions you assign through add rights to the existing list. 默认情况下，公用或专用队列的创建者具有 "完全控制" 权限，而 "域组" 有权获取队列属性、获取权限和写入队列。By default, the creator of a public or private queue has full control, and the domain group Everyone has permission to get queue properties, get permissions, and write to the queue. 调用 时，用户和权限信息将追加到现有列表的底部。When you call , the user and permissions information is appended to the bottom of the existing list. 系统会按顺序检查每个 ，直到发生以下事件之一：The system examines each in sequence until one of the following events occurs: - 拒绝访问 明确拒绝对线程的访问令牌中列出的某个受信者的任何请求的访问权限。An access-denied explicitly denies any of the requested access rights to one of the trustees listed in the thread's access token. - 线程的访问令牌中列出的受信者的一个或多个允许访问 项显式授予所有请求的访问权限。One or more access-allowed items for trustees listed in the thread's access token explicitly grant all the requested access rights. - 已检查所有 项，但至少有一个请求的访问权限尚未显式允许，在这种情况下，将隐式拒绝访问。All items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied. 在 `rights` 参数中指定的队列的权限可以是以下任意组合：The rights to a queue, specified in the `rights` parameter, can be any combination of the following: - 完全控制Full Control - 删除消息Delete Message - 接收消息Receive Message - 速览消息Peek Message - 接收日志消息Receive Journal Message - 获取队列属性Get Queue Properties - 设置队列属性Set Queue Properties - 获取权限Get Permissions - 设置权限Set Permissions - 获取队列所有权Take Queue Ownership - 写入消息Write Message 枚举表示一组可以使用按位运算符组合的位标志，或用于生成 `rights` 参数。The enumeration represents a set of bit flags that you can combine using the bitwise operator OR to build the `rights` parameter. 下表显示了此方法是否在各种工作组模式下可用。The following table shows whether this method is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 或 从 或 请求生成的事件，分别为特定线程。A or event results from a or request, respectively, to a specific thread. 通常，在将其相关组件置于控件或窗体中时，将设置 ，因为这些组件绑定到特定线程。Typically, the is set when its related component is placed inside a control or a form, because those components are bound to a specific thread. 通常，同步对象将方法调用封送到单个线程。Typically, the synchronizing object marshals a method call into a single thread.

public: property bool Transactional { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示队列是否只接受事务。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the queue accepts only transactions.

value.span: 如果队列只接受作为事务的一部分发送的消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the queue accepts only messages sent as part of a transaction; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务性消息处理是指将几个相关消息耦合到一个事务中。Transactional messaging refers to the coupling of several related messages into a single transaction. 作为事务的一部分发送消息可确保消息按顺序传递、只传递一次，并从其目标队列成功检索。Sending messages as part of a transaction ensures that the messages are delivered in order, delivered only once, and successfully retrieved from their destination queue. 如果队列是事务性的，则它仅接受作为事务的一部分发送的消息。If a queue is transactional, it accepts only messages that are sent as part of a transaction. 但是，可以在不显式使用事务性 、和 语法的情况下，从本地事务队列发送或接收非事务性消息。However, a non-transactional message can be sent or received from a local transaction queue without explicitly using transactional , , and syntax. 如果将非事务性消息发送到事务性队列，此组件会为其创建单个消息事务，除非使用直接格式名称引用远程计算机上的队列。If a non-transactional message is sent to a transactional queue, this component creates a single-message transaction for it, except in the case of referencing a queue on a remote computer using a direct format name. 在这种情况下，如果在发送消息时未指定事务上下文，则不会为您创建一个，并将消息发送到死信队列。In this situation, if you do not specify a transaction context when sending a message, one is not created for you and the message will be sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果将非事务性消息发送到事务性队列，则在发生异常的情况下将无法回滚消息。If you send a non-transactional message to a transactional queue, you will not be able to roll back the message in the event of an exception. 是线程单元感知的，因此，如果单元状态为 `STA`，则无法在多个线程中使用事务。 is threading apartment aware, so if your apartment state is `STA`, you cannot use the transaction in multiple threads. Visual Basic 将主线程的状态设置为 `STA`，因此必须在 `Main` 子例程中应用 。Visual Basic sets the state of the main thread to `STA`, so you must apply the in the `Main` subroutine. 否则，利用另一个线程发送事务性消息将引发 异常。Otherwise, sending a transactional message using another thread throws a exception. 使用以下片段应用 。You apply the by using the following fragment. ```vb public sub Main() ``` 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example displays the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#27)]

member this.UseJournalQueue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收的消息是否复制到日记队列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether received messages are copied to the journal queue.

value.span: 如果从队列接收到的消息复制到其日记队列，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if messages received from the queue are copied to its journal queue; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当消息队列应用程序创建新的应用程序队列时，它会自动在同一位置创建关联的日记队列。When the Message Queuing application creates a new application queue, it automatically creates an associated journal queue in the same location. 日志队列用于跟踪从队列中删除的消息。The journal queue is used to track the messages removed from a queue. 设置此属性将修改 "消息队列" 队列。Setting this property modifies the Message Queuing queue. 因此，任何其他 实例都受此更改的影响。Therefore, any other instances are affected by the change. 日志队列不跟踪从队列中删除的消息，因为其接收时间计时器过期，也不跟踪使用消息队列目录服务（信息存储区或 Active Directory）从队列中清除的消息。The journal queue does not track messages removed from the queue because their time-to-be-received timer expired, nor does it track messages purged from the queue by using a Message Queuing directory service (Information Store or Active Directory). 应用程序无法将消息发送到日记队列;它们仅限于对这些队列的只读访问。Applications cannot send messages to journal queues; they are limited to read-only access of these queues. 而且，消息队列从不从日志队列中删除消息。Furthermore, Message Queuing never removes messages from journal queues. 使用队列的应用程序必须通过接收或清除队列来清除这些消息。The application using the queue must clear these messages either by receiving them or by purging the queue. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息队列的 属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message queue's property. [!code-csharp[MessageQueue#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue/CS/class1.cs#28)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供消息队列对象的本机 Windows 句柄，用于将消息发送到队列。The provides a native Windows handle to the message queue object that is used for sending messages to the queue. 如果更改队列的路径，将关闭句柄，并使用新值重新打开。If you change the path of the queue, the handle is closed and reopened with a new value. 下表显示了此属性在各种工作组模式下是否可用。The following table shows whether this property is available in various Workgroup modes. |工作组模式Workgroup mode|可用Available| |--------------------|---------------| |本地计算机Local computer|是Yes| |本地计算机和直接格式名称Local computer and direct format name|是Yes| |远程计算机Remote computer|NoNo| |远程计算机和直接格式名称Remote computer and direct format name|是Yes|
